comments: *Update: Wow!! Only 4€ for a full subscription!! Thank you guys!! the new features are also great!!! *I don't know yet how affordable is this app, i fear i won't be able to purchase it after they reintroduce the paying plans. But i am really thankful for this free period, i feel it helps and i really needed a good tool to help me regain balance at this strange, unpredictable time. Thank you! Great and beautiful app! 🙏

I initially installed it because of the aesthetic appeal. Recently I have been using the planne function regularly and it is really great to have the three subsections for work, play and test. It helps me make sure that these needs are balanced. I try to fill the three clouds when I remember, but I'm not yet regular with it. The Thought Diary function was immensely helpful in a difficult situation. Even my therapist was really impressed by this app. Thank you so much!

The app is great. If you pay for the non free parts it would be a better experience. I'm currently using the free section but helps as have to think and find the positive in the day and why do I think its happend. It helps to re read when going through a rough day and realising that you have more good days if you find the good.

I like it so far. Would be usefull to have it on other languages. Really like the rabbit on app icon, It may sound crazy 😄 but every day I remind my self to speak with rabbit, share my thoughts with him and try to stay positive. It is so easy to forget how much I have done before and go down by judging and critisizing myself for being lazy. Day planner helps to realize that this is just negative thinking. Meditations are ok.

It has a cute visual design and is very simple to use, only I do wish there were some more features other than writing down notes. Maybe some guided meditations...idk, something with voicework. EDIT 8/15/2020: A few months in and I'm starting to face a bug. While using the daily planner app, which I often do, copies of my tasks will come out of nowhere and more will eventually be added automatically when I tried to delete them. Also, I did make the subscription purchase but for some reason I rec

title: Unwinding Anxiety®
description:
Learn to control your anxiety with Sharecare’s Unwinding Anxiety. Break the cycle of worry with exercises to calm your mind, check-ins, experts and community support.

Our progressive 30-day program, with short daily exercises, will help you learn how your mind works, so you can change habits. You’ll learn how to switch gears the moment unwanted sensations and anxiety arise, and ultimately change the “habit-loop” that leads to anxiety. 

The program was designed by Judson Brewer, MD, PhD, a renowned thought leader in the science of self-mastery. Dr. Brewer has 20 years of clinical and research experience at Yale and the Center of Mindfulness at the University of Massachusetts Medical School. His TED talks and lectures are popular worldwide.

PRICING

Unwinding Anxiety® offers an unlimited free trial that includes the first four daily modules. Upgrade in app to access all features and the remaining modules on an auto-renewing subscription basis*:

1 month: $29.99
6 months: $139.99
1 year: $209.99

Awareness and Anxiety Relief—one step at a time
With each step you’ll build momentum to the next one, gaining confidence one day at a time. As you progress, you’ll see from your own experience a sustainable change in your relationship with your emotions.

Learn how to flex your mindful muscle
Awareness methods empower you to turn-off your inner critic and turn-on your curiosity -- and by extension, feel better in the moment. Learning how to be kind to yourself isn’t easy, but it’s naturally rewarding, so your mind and body will want to do it again and again! 

Get in touch with your inner teacher
One user told us, “Unwinding Anxiety helped me find the inner teacher in me to learn how to change my relationship with anxiety and feel better about myself.” And, that’s just what this app was designed to do—put you in the driver’s seat to regulate and manage your response to anxiety.

Own your progress and feel the change
When you keep track of your development, you own it. A progress analytic dashboard, daily exercises, along with a unique stress test help you chronicle your mood and anxiety levels throughout the day, so you gain invaluable insights into triggers and behaviors that occur in your body and mind.  You will end your day on a healthy note with specific practices before bed for a restful sleep.

Key Features 
•	You’ll have access to experts, including Dr. Judson Brewer. 
•	You’re not alone. You can share your experience, ask questions and feel supported by those who “get” what you’re going through. 
•	Proven training exercises with video and recorded lessons put you in tune with your body&mind connection, so you can control your response to anxiety.
•	An online journal helps you collect, analyze and manage your progress.

Benefits 
•	The ability to adjust the things you can, instead of spinning your wheels over what you have no control over.
•	Become more kind to yourself.
•	Control your response to anxiety.
•	Find joy living in the moment.

*PRICING & TERMS

All prices are for U.S. customers. Pricing in other counties may vary and may be converted to your local currency.

If you choose to upgrade in app, your Unwinding Anxiety® subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of term and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play account. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renew at any time in your Google Play Account Setting, but refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term.

Need help with the app? Please email uasupport@mindsciences.com

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://app.unwindinganxiety.com/terms

summary: Unwind Your Mind
recentChanges: Fixed a bug showing the wrong onboarding screen
comments: Unwinding Anxiety is easy to use and helps develop mindfulness practices for daily life along with formal learning. The online community is accepting and supportive, and all of the video/audio lessons are interesting and informative. This app really does help to reduce anxiety and worry and replace it with more valuable habits.

I have done meditation practice in the past and in and out of therapy for over 20 years dealing with anxiety. This app and the way it stays with me every day all day long has given me new tools that I never had and I am seeing changes in my mind habits I did not think possible. Thank you

Jud talks in a way that makes you comfortable (it's not boring), he is gentle in his teaching and VERY informative about how Anxiety works. The daily modules are short enough to be able to catch on and implement right away. I've gained great knowledge from day one and every day after.

So it's free for like the first 4 sessions after that you have to pay. I feel like it's pretty expensive but out of all the apps books and everything I've tried I feel like this has helped the most so I probably will pay for it.
It works. Follow the program, and the anxiety just goes away on its own.

title: Meditopia: Anxiety, Breathing
description:
A meditation app that touches your soul…
Meditopia is the leading app that helps you to get calm, reduce stress, sleep well, love, find peace and start a deep discovery within yourself. You can create a space for yourself in life and discover the happiness within.

You can listen to 250+ meditation sessions with top quality audio in both English and Spanish. You can learn to meditate, listen music to relax with nature sounds, use the timer to meditate and focus on different topics with specialized programs.

Topics are:
Welcome
Foundations 1-2
Body Awareness
Release stress
Sleep well
Acceptance
Self-confidence
Compassion
Gratitude

Start Now which includes on the go meditations:
Morning
Sleep
Small Break
Walking
Relaxation
Loneliness
After work
Pain
Tension relief
Transportation

In addition to meditation sessions, you can use Timer option to meditate without guidance with different background music options. Also, you can favorite your best meditations, download and listen to them OFFLINE!

Our aim is to spread meditation all around the world and make meditation affordable! Therefore Meditopia COSTS FAR LESS THAN OTHER APPS!

recentChanges: Want to hear some good news for a change? And let's be honest, there's no such thing as too much good news! Well, here you go! So, here you go! You've all been wondering if you could search for a topic and find the related content in the App... well, now you can! Just type any keyword into the search function in the App to access all sorts of related content. Come on, don't wait! Enjoy meditations, sleep stories, music and blog articles on the topics you are searching for!
comments: I wish there was a way to mark specific mediations as "complete" - a lot of the time when I finish a meditation it doesn't record that I've completed it. For some reason the only way to mark a segment ad complete is by going back and playing through the entire thing again, skipping using 15s button until I get to the end. Maybe it's because I end it 5 seconds early or something, but I wish there was a way I could like hold down on the segment and say "mark as complete" or something.

Very nice app, organized and stylish app. But i wont put my card and pay premium for 78₺. I can buy a trip tick with 80 ₺ to go to nice and relaxing place. I dont trust these app bc i dont know there's hidden messages behind the audios. I install it to see if it is good or not. To see the prices are high or not. For Nature is free to hear all types of sounds. for an app, you have to pay to hear all types of sounds. *i can record all sound i want and add it in one record and its free.

I enjoyed this app at the beginning. However now I find that there is too much guidance and no long sessions. The voice is asking to do something e.g. imagine, remember certain situations but it does not pause to do so, which rises irritation. I regret that I bought a subscription, which is very expensive compared to other meditation apps

You can't do much If you don't get premium and to get a free trial of premium you need to put in your card details and I don't what to do that. Just trying to find one thing that's free give me so much stress that there is no point and just to get a free app like this. I just wish that there where more things on this app that where free so I don't have to get premium

As a beginner i found delightful to be conducted into meditation and awareness by the app. Even though I didn't had the money to pay for all practices I've went through the free ones until I found a way to put in my monthly expenses. Life changer, recommend both as a free and premium user.

title: Panic Diary: A anxiety tracker app
description:
The panic diary offers you a quick and uncomplicated option to track, sort and take a look back at your anxiety & panic attacks. It is a anxiety tracker, a mood tracker. The method of documentation is based on medical and psychotherapeutic documentation recommendations. Get to know yourself and your body better and learn to identify situations and circumstances that might trigger anxiety and panic.

The goal of the app is to better identify correlations between situations, conditions and circumstances and the occurrence of anxiety and/or panic attacks and make changes based on these findings that result in an improvement of anxiety and panic disorders.

You not only have the option of documenting multiple anxiety / panic attacks per day with a precise time and with varying strengths, you can also select the related physical symptoms, external circumstances, moods, working conditions, exercise activities, your duration of sleep and fluid intake by clicking a button, and you can add notes.

After saving your entries, you will see an overview of your day. You can retroactively make changes, take a closer look at individual entries, open 7-day overviews and switch to different calendar weeks and switch to the current day at the push of a button, request a weekly overview and a monthly overview with comprehensive and comprehensible diagrams and graphics and either leave them as they are on your smartphone or save them as a PDF or image and then print them.

Your privacy is important to us! The panic diary does not collect or store any of your personal data!

The Panic Diary offers you:
Standard version:
☆ free and no advertisements
☆ PIN-protected and encrypted
☆ Save up to 10 panic attacks per day 
☆ Save your symptoms, mood, external circumstances, working conditions, exercise activities, how long you slept, your fluid intake and your personal notes. 
☆ All entries can also be edited retroactively. 
☆ Back up your diary locally on your cell phone. 
☆ Compare your individual entries with each other to find similarities. 
☆ Get to know yourself better. 

Premium version:

In the premium version, you have additional access to the already available functions of the standard version:

★ NO SUBSCRIPTION
★ Just activate once and get unlimited use of the diary. 
★ Weekly/Monthly  overview with comprehensible graphics and diagrams of the distribution of the strength of the panic attacks, number of panic attacks per day, the times of day at which the panic attacks occur, how long you slept, your fluid intake, your most frequent symptoms, your mood, the most frequent external circumstances, the working conditions, exercise activities. 
★ You can save each individual graphic as a PDF on your device and you can immediately print each individual graphic.
★ Save your anxiety diary online in an encrypted format so you can transfer your diary to another device. 
★ Import/Export your diary online with just one click. 
★ All data are encrypted!

Manual: https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/appdiary/manual/index.html

FAQ's: https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/appdiary/faq/index.html

Privacy: https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/appdiary/legal/privacy.html

Terms: https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/appdiary/legal/terms.html

Disclaimer: https://www.body-and-mind-meditation.de/appdiary/legal/disclaimer.html

comments: The developer was very quick to respond when I had questions about the Premium version. I've only used it for one day but it seems to be what I'm looking for. I'll update in a few wks after I use it more.

All info missing, I logged a weeks worth of information and today I got on to log a panic attack and all of my other logs are gone. None existant. I also kept getting the pay for premium. Now my logs are gone and it wants me to pay for an app that erases logs. I had saved my entries as well. I went to settings and all of my previous settings changed!!! Waste of time, energy.

Ty for writing back, it was my phone and my tablet not the app🤦🏻‍♀️ I'm sorry!I just realized this yesterday, my tablet is older then my phone! I wanted to update my post: I actually use this app to track my anxiety/panic/now depression/OCD attacks, the personal note that it provides for you I don't use anymore I use another app called The Zone which is a journaling app.Between the 2 apps they have helped me a lot.This is a really great & helpful app alone with both apps I'm very pleased.Ty!
Great app. I'm just curious how you can purchase the premium version? There doesn't seem to be a link or opt in. Thanks!
This app is great I use it almost every day. I share screenshots with my doctor every day. Thank you so much for making this app

title: 7 Cups: Anxiety & Stress Chat
description:
Feeling worried, sad, stressed or lonely? Need to talk to someone? Download 7 Cups now for FREE anonymous emotional support & counseling from trained active listeners. Easy to use text chat. Real listeners available for you 24/7 & that’s not all:

- Chat 1-1 with a listener any time
- Calm yourself with 300 free mindfulness exercises
- Get personalized care with our free wellness test
- Boost your mood with simple activities
- Learn & grow from short videos 
- Feel supported in chat rooms & community forums
- Access online message therapy with licensed therapists
 
We start you on a “growth path” that will encourage and support you as you take daily steps to become stronger.

Thousands of people use 7 Cups every week.

EMOTIONAL SUPPORT ON DEMAND:

Feeling stressed, anxious, or depressed? Having relationship problems? Sometimes you need to vent. Finding and scheduling a therapist can be time-consuming and expensive, and you can’t always open up to friends, family, or coworkers.

Now you can get emotional support anytime, anywhere with 7 Cups. This app gives you the help you need, fast and free, in a way that fits your life.

• Connect anytime, anywhere with listeners who care
• Speak your mind without any fear of being judged
• All listeners trained in active listening

IN THE MEDIA:

Founded by a licensed psychologist, 7 Cups has been featured in LifeHacker (“Technology can help you find someone to chat with about your problems to, or even connect you with a professional that can offer lasting, long-term help”), Medical Daily (“Talking therapy for people on-the-go”), and TechCrunch (“One of the top 8 startups from Y Combinator’s Summer ’13 Demo Day”).

100% CONFIDENTIAL:

Remain 100% anonymous. No one will ever know who you are—not even your listeners or therapists.

LISTENERS WHO CARE:

Our listeners are volunteers. They aren’t getting paid; they’re here because they want to help.

They care.

We have over 160,000 trained listeners and licensed therapists to choose from. Listeners provide support across 189 countries and in 140 languages. Each listener has a profile with reviews and a list of categories that they specialize in, ranging from panic attacks and bullying to eating disorders, surviving a breakup, and more.

When you find the listener you want, connect instantly via chat. Try a new listener each time, or pick one listener and develop a deeper ongoing relationship.

FAST & FREE:

The app is free to download, and all listeners are 100% free. After you download the app, you can start a conversation in less than 60 seconds.

UPGRADE PRICING & TERMS

7 Cups offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$12.99/month
$94.99/year

Your 7 Cups upgrade will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

7 Cups also offers a Forever subscription paid for in a single non-renewing upfront payment of $399.99 granting unlimited access to 7 Cups Upgrade forever.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:

Read more about our terms of service and privacy policy here:
http://www.7cups.com/privacy.php

Download 7 Cups and start feeling better today!

If you love 7 Cups, please take 20 seconds to give us a nice review. It really helps! For other feedback, contact info@7cups.com. Thank you.

For users aged 13+.

comments: Hey 7 Cups Team! I really like the idea of your network. But this app definitely needs improvements. I am visual impaired so I had my phones font size in a large level... which wasn't possible with this app. I couldn't open a chat or other things. I tried to use it with TalkBack then, which didn't work as well. Please improve the app and make it more accessible. Thanks!

Great concept but needs improvement. The chat function is glitchy, and there's more functionality on the website than the app. I really wanted to use this app and might change my review if the bugs are fixed. The initial bot chat interface bounces around back to the top and gives error messages. Was not able to take some sort of evaluation because of it. I thought the monthly subscription was for talking with a therapist. But that's another $150.

notifies whenever someone like a listener says something to you, it's more faster to access than on your computer, and it's pretty good overall :) all of the features aren't on there like on a computer but it still provides you with the important things like the communities, forums, and chats with people! i was surprised with how supportive and friendly <3 the people are on here that listens to what you have to say and you can help out people by becomimg a listener which can make you feel good!

Very Helpful! I was pleasantly surprised with how much this app assisted me in a time of great stress and frustration. My only complaint was that the chat was extremely glitchy when I tried to scroll up and read the older messages above, it wouldn't let me at times. Hopefully they can fix the chat glitches to make it more user friendly, because then it would be perfect.

I would love to give this app 5 stars but I can't. It's just that whenever I feel down, I go chat with the bot but the app glitches so much that I can't even read the messages. One time we are discussing something new but then it glitches out and it puts me onto an older part of our conversation. I- I just don't know what to do. I know it was not intentional, but still. Please fix this. 7 Cups has a lot of potential and I would be sad if it was all wasted.

title: Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises
description:
Don’t Panic!!! This has caused more panic than any other phrase of the language. We present you Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises; an app designed to render instant Anxiety Relief and stop the Panic Attack before it gets out of hand.

What is the ladder leading to Panic? According to us it all starts from Stress; Stress is the main cause of distress of the majority of us living in this fast paced world. Stress when accumulated manifests itself into Anxiety and Anxiety has its own set of physical and emotions symptoms. We always seek to treat our anxiety symptoms as they are very disturbing for us and people around us; anxiety symptoms can be; 

•	Increased Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
•	Palpitations
•	Sweating
•	Irrational decision making
•	Chest Pains

And that is still stage one; once these anxiety symptoms are not treated they can mature into an Anxiety Disorder where these anxiety symptoms reappear as anxiety disorder and many other forms and also may get triggered based on certain situations.

Panic Attacks are one form of Anxiety disorder and they can be really daunting for anyone who doesn’t really understand the root cause. Panic attack symptoms are very similar to anxiety symptoms and they add up the following to the list;

•	Racing heart
•	Numbness of hands
•	Feeling loss of control

Panic Attack symptoms can appear in anyone and in any situation, the underlying anxiety disorder that stemmed from the chronic stress sometimes manifests itself in a very severe form and the person end up in the Emergency room complaining of illness that is not there; all due to Panic attack.

During a Panic Attack the best and worst advice is the same; “Don’t Panic”; but to take it further a step we have designed this Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises app that renders instant relief from Anxiety and Panic Attacks. The technique used is quite simple; Breathing Exercises, we have utilized the power of breath of bring the calmness and focus back into the person suffering from Panic attack or Anxiety.

The step by step instructions take the focus away from the problems and bring them to the carefully designed Breathing Exercises; with a combination of short, medium and long breaths we have designed the perfect breathing exercise for anxiety relief and panic attacks. These breathing exercises follow the same rule of;

Inhale – Hold – Exhale – Hold – Repeat

With an assistive sound and soothing background music these breathing exercises will take the anxiety away control the Panic Attack.

Feedback for these breathing exercises is taken at each activity and next activities are designed based on the user input on the intensity of Anxiety and Panic Attack. We recommend that you keep this Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises app with you all the time and in case you feel any anxiety of notice panic attack symptoms approaching just press the button and we will take it from there.

Wellness Labs is focused towards alleviating the lives of everyone around us and Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises app is one of our efforts to relax people and take all the anxiety, panic attacks and phobias away from them. We look forward to your feedback and improve our app based on your input.
descriptionHTML:
Don’t Panic!!! This has caused more panic than any other phrase of the language. We present you Panic Attack Anxiety Relief: Breathing Exercises; an app designed to render instant Anxiety Relief and stop the Panic Attack before it gets out of hand.

What is the ladder leading to Panic? According to us it all starts from Stress; Stress is the main cause of distress of the majority of us living in this fast paced world. Stress when accumulated manifests itself into Anxiety and Anxiety has its own set of physical and emotions symptoms. We always seek to treat our anxiety symptoms as they are very disturbing for us and people around us; anxiety symptoms can be;

• Increased Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
• Palpitations
• Sweating
• Irrational decision making
• Chest Pains

And that is still stage one; once these anxiety symptoms are not treated they can mature into an Anxiety Disorder where these anxiety symptoms reappear as anxiety disorder and many other forms and also may get triggered based on certain situations.

Panic Attacks are one form of Anxiety disorder and they can be really daunting for anyone who doesn’t really understand the root cause. Panic attack symptoms are very similar to anxiety symptoms and they add up the following to the list;

• Racing heart
• Numbness of hands
• Feeling loss of control

Panic Attack symptoms can appear in anyone and in any situation, the underlying anxiety disorder that stemmed from the chronic stress sometimes manifests itself in a very severe form and the person end up in the Emergency room complaining of illness that is not there; all due to Panic attack.

recentChanges: The App
comments: It definitely makes an anxiety attack not as severe. I wish there was more than just breathing exercises, like maybe some progressive muscle relaxation or something like that, but the calming music is really helpful. Its helped me be able to practice breathing techniques without the app.
Easy and effective. Starts right away and asks you how you're feeling to adjust accordingly.

I literally JUST had a panic attack and this app got me through it soooooo well! Thank you so much for making this app and also thanks for not having ads. I know you can't die from panic attacks but it sure does feel like it, and this app did an amazing job on helping me with me breathing! I don't know what else to say! If anyone is looking for a good app to help you through your panic attacks, this is the app! Again, thanks so much for this app! You're an amazing human being for making this app

I just used this app for the first time and it's absolutely fantastic! I have anxiety and am trying to work on my breathing. My son and daughter have Aspergers syndrome and I am going to suggest it for them too. Because it's so visual...I feel positive that it will work to calm them too. Thank you so much.

I'd like a longer or different one. i think a few more selections make it easy to know which exercise to use for the proper moment. each attack is different at times. it started to work but the short length for me was the only downfall. i will keep it and see how it progresses.

title: Mind journal: anxiety relief & mental health diary
description:
What if you could type several sentences in your journal and get anxiety relief immediately? This is how CBT guided diary works. 

Get to know yourself by diving deeply into your passions, feelings, and life goals.

Mental health is a highly complex machine and sometimes it falls into depression. Cognitive behavior therapy (CBT) journal comes to help through dozens of effective techniques:
- Mindfulness journaling lets you unwind at the end of the day
- Guided reflection improves mindfulness and teach gratitude
- Mood tracker diary allows keeping track of mood dynamics
- Self care diary serves for learning new ways of thinking and overcoming depression
- Journal itself makes bipolar smoother

Mood tracker diary is here to find out the prerequisites for depression:
- what time of the day causes bad mood
- particular activities responsible for negative thoughts
- ineffective behavior

Mental health apps are often hired for fast check-in as if it had been any helpful in the therapy. Ory - journal app, on the other hand, provides instruments for deep personal transformations as well as anxiety relief.

Guided journal notebook releases a huge amount of positive energy which is hidden by mental health issues, such as anxiety and depression. 

Self care journaling with Ory consists of these components:

- Relax and reflect in the diary
- 3 to 10 logs with the mood tracker to obtain the whole mental health picture and identify bipolar
- Development of happiness by following anxiety relief journal prompts
- Listening of meditation and affirmation for good sleep

Mental health wellbeing requires daily impact on it. The more your work on reflection habits the more powerful the brain muscles get, and the more output in you receive in the direction of anxiety relief. 

Destructive factors affect our mind permanently causing bipolar depression or anxiety. An excessive amount of information, lack of self care culture - all these things influence negatively mental health. Cognitive behavior therapy (CBT) journal is used to bring up positive relations to the outer world by strengthening up the inner. 

Benefits of mental health self-care with Ory journal notebook:
- gratitude uplift at work
- anxiety relief appears really fast thanks to proven psychotherapy methods
- developing an anxiety relief mindset via following self care programs

Get to know yourself by following mental health self care reflection prompts.

Give CBT diary a try in the prevention of depression and getting fundamentally happier.

Ory - mental health thoughts journal provides personalized scenarios for guided reflection on actual areas such as bipolar, depression, gratitude.

recentChanges: We added lock and fixed cloud back up :)
comments: I love this app, it helps to guide you and gives you ideas and things to think about Update: 10/12/2020 I loved this app at the beginning. Then the question of the day stopped changing. It has been stuck on my 3 personal qualities. I stopped using the app for a while and recently got back into it and it is still asking that same question. It is irritating to me.

I like it but there's a couple of bugs with the app. When I'm typing my journal entry, I scroll back up or down to fix a typo and it will take me to the next step (listing victories of the day). One time it did that and it erased everything that I typed. when I select a logged mood/activity, it pulls up the screen for the day. It will say "no logs." I can only view the moods by viewing by week, or viewing a day after the actual day of the mood. For example, a mood on Aug 31 will show on Sept 1

Love this so far, it very much helps to track your mood. Also it makes you think several times about the worst things in your life so that you can make sure they have some positive impact, even the smallest bit. I will be working with this app for more and I hope after some time I would be able to notice some changes in myself!

So far so good. I will review after I've used it longer. Only 2 days so far but I very much like the way it is laid out - one has to stop and really think about one's self and why one feels, thinks, reacts or emotes in certain ways. I would like to know how to go back and look at my past stories. So frustrating!!!

This app is incredible I love the feeling of opening this app and expressing my feeling and how my day went its like you have someone to talk to its amazing I would really recommend this app, I use this every day and wouldnt turn to a different journaling experience.

title: Wandr. - Stress, Anxiety & Panic Relief
description:
*Important: Wandr. requires at least 4GB of RAM to run its best *


When life gets busy and overwhelming, turn to your Wandr. app to calm your breathing and dissolve worrying thoughts to feel noticeable relief from stress, anxiety and panic attacks. 

It’s the virtual nature escape in your pocket when you need it the most. 

This completely unique virtual nature walk app transports users to peaceful locations to properly relax, help calm the mind and provide immediate help during panic/anxiety attacks. 

Best suited for those who;

•   Suffer from anxiety, panic attacks and mental over-stimulation
•   By nature struggle to actually ‘relax’ or don’t know how to
•   Need help calming the mind quickly for sleep
•   Are affected by city living or work stress 
•   Find themselves restricted in going outside for any reason


“I find it hard to relax and felt extremely relaxed after using the app. Nice way to wind down after a busy day before bed. Forest feels like home, can almost smell the trees 🙂” Iain  - Anxiety, Work Stress, Restricted Movement.

“It's great! I really enjoyed the night beach scene. I've had a stressful day and I found it to be very relaxing. I thought the sound of the crackling fire was brilliant, very authentic. Helped calm my busy mind to get to sleep. Thank you“ Diane – Anxiety, Busy Mind. 

“Very relaxing. I struggle to get to sleep at night and have stress from energetic kids. I felt noticeably more relaxed after using the app. Also loved chasing the animals, went for a swim - very enjoyable.” Luke – Busy parent, Insomnia.

“I really loved them all (scenes) but the Waterfall scenery would have to be my favourite. Climbing up the rocks to the waterfall seemed like I was truly exploring somewhere different. Then to hear the water get louder as I approached was soothing and calming. The sky's pink tones were also beautiful to gaze at.” Amanda - Anxiety.


Features Include:

5 Different Nature Scenes

Breathe Tool

Relaxation Music

Customisable Nature Sounds

Guided Muscle Relaxation Audio

Sleep Sounds

Positive Affirmations to self-soothe during an anxiety or panic attack. 

Free Options that are actually helpful!

Professional Healthcare Resources


Objective:

Become calm. Feel properly relaxed. Regain control. Anywhere, anytime.

Beyond taking a short walk in a relaxing environment, there are no objectives within a scene.

Casually explore the surrounds taking it all in, or just find a view that calms you and sit and stare - like you would if you really were sitting alone on a secluded island beach.

Take your time. There’s no rush to the next level or time limit to the finish line. Nothing is chasing you and there’s nothing you need to achieve. Just enjoy where the escape takes you. 

Try it now for free!

Panic/Anxiety Attack Suffers: We recommend you download it and get to know the app now so you can have it ready to help you during your next attack. 

“Made for others like us who need easy tools to help manage our anxiety and panic attacks living a busy city life.” @wandr.relief

comments: I really enjoyed the app it is great to relax to, I used it after having a big day and now I feel so much better. I really loved the night beach scene it was very authentic the cracking of the fire is amazing. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who is anxious or just someone wanting to relax and distress. It is great to use at night to help you sleep it helped to turn off the mind and put relaxing thoughts I your head to help you drop off to sleep.

Actually I really like this app. It goes beyond the typical audio by giving you a sense of place as well through visual guidance and scene setting. Great for when I need a clear head when I am creating artwork or when trying to get my kids prepared for bed. Great app, great concept.
Love this app ! So simple to use and yet very powerful. In our hectic lifestyle, we all need to take some time out to relax. And this app makes relaxing a breeze.
Great relaxation app. Only took a few minutes to quiet the mind, much needed during times of stress.
Beautiful scenes to wander through at your own pace & a bonus feeling of achievement in finding all the inspiration orbs in each area

title: Self-help Anxiety Management
description:
** please note, we are transitioning to our new version of the app, available at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.mindgardentech.sam and would encourage you to try that instead. This version will be phased out from 31/5/2021 **

SAM is a friendly app that offers a range of self-help methods for people who are serious about learning to manage their anxiety. 

SAM has been developed by a university team of psychologists, computer scientists and student users. Established methods of self-help have been combined with high standards of usability to provide an engaging, flexible, and practical resource. 

The key features of SAM are: 

• Clearly laid out menus 
• User guidance 
• External links 
• Self-monitoring of anxiety with graphical display 
• 25 self-help options covering: Information about anxiety, Thinking and anxiety, Physical relaxation, Mental relaxation, Health and Anxiety 
• Guidance on putting self-help into practice 
• Closed social network of SAM users 

The content of SAM is presented in various media formats in order to support users in learning about anxiety and practicing self-help. Although not text-heavy, users will need to study the guidance to get the best out of SAM. Users are encouraged to build their own Anxiety Toolkit of SAM resources that they find helpful and to draw on this for regular practice in managing situations that are associated with anxiety. 

SAM may be used with or without the support of a registered health practitioner but you may wish to consult with your local health or well-being practitioner if you are uncertain about using SAM.

By downloading SAM, you are indicating your agreement to UWE's Terms and Conditions at http://sam-app.org.uk/samapp_tcs.pdf and UWE's Privacy Policy at http://sam-app.org.uk/samapp_privacy.pdf

recentChanges: Bug fixes and updated terms for Social Cloud
comments: Great app. Has helped me through alot of tough situations. Although, i dont have any option to look at the replies on social cloud so i would like to know how so that i can know what other people have to say.

The app’s self-help approach is similar to apps that help people lose weight. Tracking progress is simple and straightforward. The tools the app uses to relieve anxiety are varied and appropriate to a variety of people. The app divides tools into different categories based on either active or reflective approaches, depending on a user’s preferences. All this combines with a colorful, almost whimsical user interface that is simultaneously easy to navigate and visually appealing and calming.

Tried using this app again since my last review hoping that it was my WiFi messing up or the app was having a bad day, nope. When I try to create an account for the forums it won't let me. Keeps on saying 'check your connection'. Can't make an account or login. Hopeless.

Nice app and very helpful , But chat cloud needs an option added to notify us when a user responds to our posts and also a private PM section for those who wish to contact each other , Please can this be added asap it would be most helpful.
Not good. App is designed for less than android 10. Error "this was made for older version". Tried to contact by email. Email was auto-returned

title: PsychApp – Depression, Anxiety, Panic Attack
description:
PsychApp is an application that includes expert provided information about depression, anxiety, and panic attack which are three important issues we encounter in our daily lives. In addition, it includes tests for each category.
    
    ☯ Ad-free version.

    ☯ It covers depression, anxiety, and panic attack categories.

    ☯ You can evaluate yourself in each category with different psychological tests.

    ☯ You will have access to a special 10-day program provided by experts in each category.

    ☯ You will receive daily tips and suggestions that you can apply about your selected category.

    ☯ You can set an alarm for daily tips as a reminder.

    ☯ You can observe your daily mood and your implementation status of the suggestions statistically.

    ☯ At the end of the 10-day program you will get your general evaluation.

    ☯ You may easily share your daily tip and your evaluations in social media.

    ☯ You can change the appearance of the app with different themes you can choose.

    ☯ You may take daily notes for each day.

    ☯ Different language options: English, German, Italian, Turkish.

    ☯ You may see your tips for the previous days.

title: WorryTree: Anxiety Relief - CBT Self-Help Tool
description:
Identify your worries, anxiety and negative thoughts, take action and transform your thinking so you feel calmer and less anxious. WorryTree helps you do all of this based on established Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) techniques. 

*Now featured on the NHS Digital App Library*

"This is the best app honestly for anxiety or obsessive thinking. It's very simple and has a calm design and gives the user a feeling of empowerment in their life." 

We've created a very simple, easy to use and practical app that will support you through the problem-solving process helping you either to make a plan to deal with your worry, or find in-the-moment distractions to help you cope.

WorryTree is for you if: 

- You're looking for a simple, practical and easy to use app to manage your worry, panic and anxiety 
- You want to be able to make a plan for dealing with a situation you're worrying or feeling stressed about
- You struggle to remember what helps you to feel calm when you're feeling anxious
- You're committed to changing your thought habits for the benefit of your mental health

WorryTree is not: 

- A substitute for professional mental health care
- A complex app with lots of layers and clever algorithms - we've designed it to be very simple so that it's easy to use when you're feeling anxious or panicky
- A magician - Real habit change will only happen if you commit to regularly catching, recording and problem solving your worries, but we'll do our best to support you  
- Built by a faceless app development company - we're a family-run UK business created by anxiety sufferers with a genuine wish to help others who struggle with worry
- Just an app - we're building a supportive community for users and via our blog too

"This app is so simple, wonderful and functional at the same time. When I am worrying about something, I just write it on this app, and then I feel much better."

**If you love WorryTree then you'll love subscribing to WorryTree Plus too!** 

WorryTree Plus brings all of the basic features of WorryTree, plus some extras too! Use our uncertainty tool to work through any uncertainties that you're struggling with, go back and review your worries after the event, consider your negative thinking styles and add your action plans to your own calendar. You can even now use WorryTree as a Gratitude Journal! 

Your subscription to WorryTree Plus enables us to keep the basic version of WorryTree free forever for people who can't afford to pay. It also allows us to invest more money into improving WorryTree for all of our users and to keep our app advertising free, so it's always this simple to use. 

After you choose either our monthly or annual subscription plan and confirm your purchase, the payment will be charged to your credit or debit card via your Google Play Account. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

You can read our Terms and Conditions in full at https://worry-tree.com/terms-conditions. 

**WorryTree is not a substitute for professional mental health care, therapy or advice. If you're worried about any aspect of your mental health, or someone else's, you should always approach a professional.**

You can read our Terms and Conditions in full at https://worry-tree.com/terms-conditions.

**WorryTree is not a substitute for professional mental health care, therapy or advice. If you're worried about any aspect of your mental health, or someone else's, you should always approach a professional.**
summary: Take control of your worry, anxiety and negative thoughts
recentChanges: Welcome to your new improved WorryTree with some big changes based on your feedback! You asked to be able to schedule worry time and so we've added that to our Settings. You also asked if you could save your worries for later and so we've added that too. And with a seven day trial for WorryTree Plus you can try some of our extra features for free! As always with a big release like this, we'd encourage you to get in touch at hello@worry-tree.com if you have any problems with this new update.
comments: I like the fact you can add a PIN. The UI is also amazing. I love the concept of this app and how simple it is to use. Custom categories are also a really good feature. I don't really have any criticism for this app, other than that it could maybe do with some more features? Like maybe some small things such as changing the colour scheme or background of the app?

This is the best app honestly for anxiety or obsessive thinking. It's very simple and has a calm design and gives the user a feeling of empowerment in their life. It would be nice if it had features in the side menu like gratitude, guided audios, sleep sounds/or a panic button for relaxation breathing like some competitor apps have. I am close to making this one my main app but I was sold on the relax/panic button with breathing exercise visuals in the other apps.
App crashes on load every time

Kindly add a box named "What can you do about it" above the "what are you going to do about it" box because it encourages brainstorming and shows us our available options to handle the worry. Good app overall
This is like a "worry workbook". Incredibly helpful and reminds me of therapy sessions where the therapist listens to you articulate what's bothering you and develop a plan to help solve it.

title: FearTools - Anxiety Aid
description:
FearTools is an evidence-based app designed to help you combat anxiety, aiding you on your road to recovery. This application is especially useful for those suffering from Generalized Anxiety Disorder, Phobias, and Social Anxiety Disorder. 

FearTools contains several simple, useful, and powerful tools. They include:

Thought Diary - Challenge and reframe your unhelpful thoughts with this cognitive therapy technique

Exposure - Overcome your fears with gradual exposure, an effective behavioral therapy technique

Breathe - Relax with this simple and customizable paced breathing tool 

Information - Read information, follow self-help guidelines, and find additional resources 

Test - Take the GAD-7 anxiety questionnaire and track your symptom severity over time

Video - Discover helpful YouTube videos that can improve your mood and behavior, from guided meditations to enlightening TED talks


------

FearTools was designed in collaboration with multiple mental health professionals. FearTools is free, contains no advertisements, and is a purely non-profit venture aimed at helping people suffering from clinical depression. Thank you for supporting our efforts with your positive ratings and reviews. Please send any requests, questions, or feedback via email to moodtools@moodtools.org and we will be sure to respond to each one.

Disclaimer: This mental health application is not intended to be a replacement for treatment nor any sort of medical intervention. Treatment is, by far, the best way to overcome anxiety disorders. Psychotherapy and medications have been shown to effectively treat anxiety. This application will only aid you on your path to recovery from anxiety. If you are not being professionally treated for anxiety, please talk to your doctor or therapist or use this app to find resources that can connect you to treatment.

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes and optimizations.
comments: The thought diary helped me avoid a nasty panic attack the very first time I used it. My only gripe is that I can't seem to scroll the text boxes in the thought diary while writing an entry. Still 5 stars from me.
Oh my gosh. I love this, wish I found it earlier in my life. I have OCD, depression, anxiety, anger issues, and hear voices, so this awesome.
Great app to use really helpful and easy to use.
Very helpful app - the thought diary is excellent
Anxiety sucks, period! Thanks to app I can keep anxiety at bay. Great for unwinding.

recentChanges:
* Error correction
* Removal of advertisements in the breathing exercise
comments: Decent mood tracker app. It is not indepth enough for my liking. I do like that you can add an activity to your journal and also pix. But the pix are not full size. You can hardly see them

I have adlut adhd and if i can remeber to log my emotions it really give your psych doc and therapist an awsome idea of how stable you are or if your gonna spirl out of control. Being socail isnt easy in person gor me so this app has been an amazing asset to me.

I'm going to give 5 stars because I have ZERO complaints and i love using this kind of app, its on the top of my list! I highly recommend downloading this app if you're looking for a good app like this one!
I love this game!! 💕😊 PLEASE DO AN UPDATE WHEN YOU CAN CHANGE YOUR PINCODE ANY TIME YOU WANT!! 💕 that's the only thing to add, everything else is great! 💖💖
this app is so great! This helped me a lot with my problems and now I'm feeling better ^^

title: Steady - Breathing Meditation For Stress & Anxiety
description:
A breathing meditation app that helps you fights stress and anxiety through breathing exercises such as box breathing, and the popular 4-7-8 breathing pattern that helps with sleep. Let the timer and audio cues guide the rhythm of your breath as you breathe in and breathe out, inhaling the future and exhaling the past.

Pranayama ("prana" - life force, "yama" - regulation) is the conscious regulation & awareness of breath: the life force that both energizes and relaxes the body. It is no surprise that our breath can influence our physiology. Wim Hof, a Dutch extreme athlete, is noted for his ability to withstand freezing temperatures thanks to his breathwork. 

Even if you are not aiming to become an extreme athlete, you can enjoy the many benefits of breathwork such as strengthening your immune system (which can be confirmed by measuring your heart rate variability, a.k.a., HRV), improving your ability to deal with stress & anxiety, keeping asthma under control, etc.. In fact, you will notice an immediate sense of relaxation through a short minute of breathwork.

Deep breathing doesn't help. What helps is rhythm. Get into a rhythm.

APP FEATURES 

- 4 default programs: box breathing, triangle breathing, relaxing breathing, and ujjayi pranayama
- Custom your own breathing pattern/technique (for advanced users)
- Select background music (add an ambience to your meditation)
- Vibration cues (so you can breeth with your eyes closed)
- Choose between male & female audio cues
- Up to 3 daily reminders (you might be busy)
- Insightful statistics
- Set monthly goals
- Collect badges as you breathe
- Export data as CSV

USE CASES 

- As a daily habit/routine
- When you need to perform (e.g. before an interview, a presentation, or competition)
- Before bedtime to help you fall asleep
- As needed when feeling stressed or anxious

Disclaimer: 
Steady, a breathing meditation app, is not a substitute for your doctor visits, and it does not provide professional diagnosis or cure for your symptoms. Breeth with the app only if you are feeling well and consult your doctor before taking advice from the authors of the content in the app.

recentChanges: Early Bird Release
comments: I use it everyday. Pleasing animations, soothing ambient sounds and a super simple interface makes this app stand out. Best way to energize the start of my day or wind down before bed! Love that there are daily reminders, it helps cut through everyday distractions. But it should definitely be customizable, not fixed. Also, some sort of progress bar to visually complement the countdown would be nice and help me stay focused. PS. Kudos to the dev for being receptive & swift to act on feedback!

The app is really awesome! Also one thing that would be awesome is, maybe try to use any android phone for the screenshots of the app. And also maybe optimuse the app for the speed. The app seems a wee bit clunky, but that's alright as it's a new app as of writi this review. We all need some meditation app. This a good one, a one time fee is great.
Very practical app with an immaculate design. I just wish I could use a sound (like a bell) instead of human voices when being guided.

What I like about it is that when you feel stress or anxiety it has helps remind you to stop and take a deep breath. Something that is giving yourself a chance to unwind and relieve stress. Something so simple as remembering to just breathe.
This is an excellent way to reduce stress and promote healing. I will be using it daily as part of my self-care program.

title: Worrydolls
description:
Do you need to tell your worries?

Worrydolls gives you a small doll who is ready to listen to what is worrying you.  Tell your worry to the doll, then track it over time. 

You can use Worrydolls like a journal to help you overcome anxiety and stress.  

When your worry is finished, tell the doll it does not need to worry anymore.  Then look back at your old worries to bring you a sense of calm.
descriptionHTML:
Do you need to tell your worries?

Worrydolls gives you a small doll who is ready to listen to what is worrying you. Tell your worry to the doll, then track it over time.

You can use Worrydolls like a journal to help you overcome anxiety and stress.

When your worry is finished, tell the doll it does not need to worry anymore. Then look back at your old worries to bring you a sense of calm.
summary: Tiny dolls to remove anxiety.
recentChanges: Worrydolls wear masks!  There are a lot of worries in the world right now.  Remember that all worries pass! Until they do, the worrydolls can wear masks.
comments: I love the concept of this app. This is the only app that makes me feel less anxious. Everything here is very minimalistic, thank you for making this free without any in-app purchases! The tiny masks are so cute, good idea developer! Keep up the good work! Love this app so much ♡

really loved the concept!! also the design is so minimalist i like it a lot. would really prefer though if I can categorize the dolls and I can make an account or at least be able to transfer the data to another account. The latter would be really nice since I would be able to look back on all the previous worries I ever had since I started using the app. Also, how about a search feature? It's quite a pain scrolling through a lot before finding the one I'm looking for

This app is so calming. I really feel like I can let my worries go for a time when I tell them, and they can worry for me. As someone with OCD and plenty of other various fears in addition to scary life events, it's a relief to let go.

Lovely concept! I just wish it had more features such as relaxing background music/sounds, customizable background, and more phrases for the dolls... I hope this app gets updated because it has so much potential ❤️
I love this app very much. So I suggest all my friends to this is a good stress reliever. I think worry dolls are taking care of me. Amazing app. And dolls are very very cute.☺

title: Social Anxiety Test
description:
This app presents the Social Phobia Inventory (SPIN), a validated screening questionnaire that aims to measure the severity of Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD), also known as Social Phobia. The SPIN is a 17-item self-rating scale which covers fear, avoidance, and physical signs of social anxiety. 

Disclaimer: This questionnaire cannot indicate a diagnosis of social anxiety disorder. Only a qualified professional can make this diagnosis. Please consult a physician if you are concerned about social anxiety disorder. 

The Social Phobia Inventory (SPIN) is © 1995, 2014, 2017, Jonathan R.T. Davidson, MD. All Rights Reserved. For further use, please contact the copyright holder at mail@cd-risc.com.

summary: Evaluate your risk of social anxiety disorder with a 17 question screening test
developerAddress:
30 N Gould St Ste 11721
Sheridan, WY 82801
recentChanges: Minor optimizations and improvements.
comments: I have severe anxiety, so this really helped me when I figured out more about my diagnosis. It helped me open up and realize I'm more than a little embarrassment. I want people to see my strong opend side, not my social anxiety side. Panic attacks have gone away a little bit. I'm more confident about my body. I might not be done with anxiety, but, I've been helped more than ever. THANKS❤❤

The questions may be appropriate to determine an overall summary of whether you have social anxiety, but what I found unacceptable was one of the Resources linking straight to a "How Niceness is Killing Your Relationship" audio. Immediately seemes very unscientific (as it doesn't even know whether I'm in a relationship) and ends with a very American advertisement - the content of which some people may deem exploitative.

Yeah it kinda change me a lot when i found i had a social anxiety... it really help me understand my true self so i research about this social anxiety..now im trying to improve my self and hide my weakness and show my strong side to other so they don't look down on me.. really thank you it really turn the table around...^ω^
That moment when you score severe social anxiety 😅.
....when you get very severe social anxiety 😶

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* “I’m generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‘Concentrate on your body’” - New York Times

* “In the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses” - Mashable

* “Eliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal” - Tech Republic

* “Found myself similarly refreshed afterwards” - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: Meditation for Anxiety and Stress
description:
ANXIETY AND STRESS: Have you ever felt anxious or stressed? Have you ever wanted to stop the constant cycle of anxiety, worry and fear? Now you will have the power to regain control of your life with our guide. Learn how stress relief meditation works and how you can implement changes immediately to help alleviate these overwhelming feelings. This beautiful guide will help you:

✓ Overcome anxiety, fear and stress
✓ Help you meditate and quiet your mind
✓ Reduce insomnia and sleep disorders
✓ Help remedy body imbalances and manage stress and disease
✓ Improve mental, physical and emotional health and well-being

Chronic stress manifests itself into physical symptoms such as low energy, headaches, aches, pains and tense muscles, chest pain and insomnia and emotional symptoms such as anxiety, restlessness, lack of motivation and sometimes even depression. Implementing a daily routine to overcome and alleviate stress is one of the best self-help and self-love things you can do for yourself. You will find after practicing meditation for 2-3 weeks you will have more energy, less aches and pains, sleep better, be more productive and focused at work and even cultivate more meaningful and communicative relationships.

Studies have shown that meditation promotes emotional health, enhance self-awareness, can reduce memory loss, controls anxiety and reduces stress. Why wouldn’t you want to take 5 to10 minutes out of your busy schedule and implement this FREE solution to overcoming stress?

FREE APP: Our app is completely free to download, and includes hours of free audio meditation and reading guides. Download our Meditation for Anxiety and Stress Guide and start learning how to overcome, reduce and control anxiety and stress in and around yourself. Included in our app are some great breathing techniques to manage your thoughts and to find instant calm.

Our informational Guide on Meditation for Anxiety and Stress will help you to reduce and overcome daily stress and anxiety within your life. 

* Understanding Anxiety
* Determining Your Type of Anxiety
* Practicing Mindfulness to Overcome Anxiety
* How to Use Breathing Techniques to Stop Anxiety 
* How to Manage Your Thoughts to Control Anxiety
* How to Manage Your Activities to Reduce Anxiety
* Ways to Find Instant Calm and Overcome Anxiety
* Getting in Tune with Your Thoughts and Feelings
* The Important of Sleep
* Taking Back Control of Your Life

GET ON TRACK: We understand that life is busy and it is hard to find time for ourselves. We have worked to make our meditations as flexible as possible by creating guided audios that range from 5 - 30 minutes. Even if you only have a few minutes each day we recommend taking a moment for you to recenter and focus with our experienced teacher guiding your through each and every step. Below are some of the many guided meditations you can enjoy for free.

1. Healing Meditation to Help Calm the Nervous System (15:38 mins)
2. Guided Meditation for Deep and Blissful Relaxation (29:33 mins)
3. Guided Meditation to Calm the Mind (39:03 mins)
4. Five Minute Body Scan (5:45 mins)
5. Guided Meditation to Release Anger and Negativity (15:29 mins)
6. Affirmations to Help Release Anger and Negativity (5:28 mins)
7. Guided Meditation to Overcome Insomnia (18:38 mins)
8. 10 Minute Morning Meditation for Gratitude (11:00 mins)
9. Total Mind, Body and Soul Relaxation (30:57 mins)
10. Guided Meditation for Honoring Boundaries (5:28 mins)
11. Guided Meditation for Letting Go (11:11 mins)
12. Motivation and Guided Visualization with Affirmations (16:46 mins)

...and many more guided meditations for stress and anxiety relief and relaxation.

Be proactive today by downloading this free guide. We are sure it will help you to better manage and alleviate your stress.

Even if you only have a few minutes each day we recommend taking a moment for you to recenter and focus with our experienced teacher guiding your through each and every step. Below are some of the many guided meditations you can enjoy for free.

1. Healing Meditation to Help Calm the Nervous System (15:38 mins)
2. Guided Meditation for Deep and Blissful Relaxation (29:33 mins)
3. Guided Meditation to Calm the Mind (39:03 mins)
4. Five Minute Body Scan (5:45 mins)
5. Guided Meditation to Release Anger and Negativity (15:29 mins)
6. Affirmations to Help Release Anger and Negativity (5:28 mins)
7. Guided Meditation to Overcome Insomnia (18:38 mins)
8. 10 Minute Morning Meditation for Gratitude (11:00 mins)
9. Total Mind, Body and Soul Relaxation (30:57 mins)
10. Guided Meditation for Honoring Boundaries (5:28 mins)
11. Guided Meditation for Letting Go (11:11 mins)
12. Motivation and Guided Visualization with Affirmations (16:46 mins)

...and many more guided meditations for stress and anxiety relief and relaxation.

Be proactive today by downloading this free guide. We are sure it will help you to better manage and alleviate your stress.
summary: Guide to help reduce and overcome daily stress and anxiety within your life.
recentChanges: This is the newest release of Meditation for Anxiety and Stress.
comments: Lovely app that gives information in reducing stress and anxiety
I can say my anxiety lessen with using this app.

title: Clear Fear
description:
Clear Fear provides you with a range of ways to manage anxiety. 

Developed by a clinician co-collaboratively with young people, Clear Fear uses a Cognitive Behavioural framework to help you change anxious thoughts and emotions, alter anxious behaviours and calm fear responses.

It also has helpful descriptions of the different ways in which anxiety shows, resources and a grit box to boost resilience.

It is recommended for the ages of 11-19 years but can be used by a younger group with the support of a parent or carer. 

Clear Fear compliments, but does not substitute for the assessment and ongoing support of a mental health.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I would give it 5 stars but when I went to look at the gifs in the "smile" section I was met with a dog flashing some cartoon teeth, it meant to look cute like "haha look at that he has a smile on its face" but that just spiked my anxiety even higher, make sure that the gifs you use don't have any triggering things in them, even very small stuff can trigger some people that are more sensitive. Also the mindfulness section only has 4 things to look at, it would be nice if more were added.

i used clear fear for a while now and im so glad i found it because its really helping. i would give 5 stars if there wasnt this little problem that gets super annoying after while. if you log into the app the first time you answer some questions like selecting which part of the world ur from, set ur passcode and a security question and all of that stuff and i confirmed everything but if i open the app i have to answer all of the questions again, like i havent answered them. please fix that!!

Good app, just two notes. When I try to type a text I cannot scrol the screen down enough to keep seeing the textbox. It disappears behind my keyboard. And I would like some excercises in it that are also in calm harm. It seems that app contains more coping strategies than just cbt and a breathing excercise it also has more interaction than clear fear. But it is a bit weird to read about harm when it is about anxiety. Another option would be to choose in the harm app what one is using it for.

This was an ok app but there are only two things you can do to calm you down. A breathing activity and the same recording of a person telling you how to calm down. Other than that it's just an app to write down goals. There is also no option to record an attack after it happened and instead you must go through one of the activities and say that it helped so that you can record something. Even then it'll not show up for awhile until the week ends. There could be many improvements but its ok.

I was recommended to this application by my therapist, and found the resources in this application helpful. However, I do realise that there is a bug that doesn't save your information when you close out of the application. Therefore, I would have to manually key in all my details from startup again. Other than the issue I mentioned, the application overall is great.

title: Mood Tracker, Journal, Diary | Anti Depression app
description:
Reflexio is a fabulous mood tracker, self care journal app with daily questions. Every day you will receive a new interesting question about your health, relations with people, self care or emotion, selfcare, wellness or depression and select your mood. 

Open your mind with Reflexio mood tracker and emotion journal and see how your mood changes through months and years! Are you looking for ways to improve your mood and wellness? Reflexio is a fabulous app that supports you in phases of anxiety and depression.

Our fabulous features:
 
🌟Mood tracker. Use this feature to explore the patterns in your mood. 
- Select your mood on the mood tracker screen. You can choose between Happy mood, Good, Neutral, Bad or Awful mood (depression) to define how you feel
- Track how your mood changes through the months and years. We recommend checking statistics of your mood daily
- Self-help for anxiety & depression (self care diary)

🌟Private diary (journal) with a fingerprint. Note how was your day.
- Make notes in your private diary with fingerprint every day
- Note in the diary about your mental health, relationships, current mood, or feelings. Reflect on wellbeing, mood, self-improvement or self care. Mark activities, personal goals or habits
- Love and relationship: reflect on your romantic relationship and problems with your couple. It can help you understand how to fix them and what steps you should do to prevent problems in your relationship.

🌟Question diary. One question a day that makes you think
- Every day you will receive a new question that will make you reflect on the most important topics of our life: friendship etc
- Share the questions with your friends through social networks!
 
🌟Word cloud. Track not only your mood, but also the most used words in the diary.
-  Get your personalized word cloud monthly, with those words that you use the most in your daily answers! The more complete your answers, the more information your word clouds will have in your journal

🌟Passcode or fingerprint 
Do not worry, all your diary notes are private. Set a password (PIN code or fingerprint) to protect your diary secrets. Change passcode whenever you want

🌟Beautiful themes to match your mood
Beautiful themes that match perfect your mood: Reflexio default, Night Sky, Pacific Forest, and Choco Autumn.

🌟Reminders
Set reminders to make sure important things don't slip away from the diary

Join us and create a happier mind. Reflexio is more just a journal or mood diary. Reflexio benefits: focus and concentration, happiness, healthier mind & motivation! 

Important: If you have noted that during a long period of time you have a bad mood or some kind of anxiety we recommend you to visit a doctor. It’s important to ask your doctor whether they think you have depression, anxiety, or it was just a bad mood days caused by the temporary life difficulties which is nothing to do with depression.

Give some time to yourself for your well being. With Reflexio App you get focus and concentration, happiness, healthier mind and motivation.

Reasons to use the diary app:

maintain a journaling routine feelings
find answers on the main life things - relations with friends, people, colleagues
find a place to reflect on important things privately and track the achievements you've made in life
get out of stress or anxiety and take your life to a new level

In Reflexio we are always happy to know your opinion and proposals about the mood tracker or journal to improve our app. Do not hesitate to ask us and we will answer you as soon as possible!
Send us your questions and suggestions to reflexio.app@gmail.com 

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reflexio_app/
