title: Cardiac coherence: reduce stress and anxiety
description:
Simple and ergonomic, discover the Cardiac coherence application which will allow you to understand the benefits of cardiac coherence for your health✨. 


 Say goodbye to your daily stress and your anxiety! 😀 
 

Features:  

- Choice of music 🎶 

- Choice of a sound on inspiration and or on expiration 🎼 

- Set a vibration for transitions 📳 

- Create your personalized session: choice of music, duration, animation 🆒 

- Personalized entertainment ☀️ 

- History of its sessions 📜 

- Modify the duration of your sessions, and of each inspiration and expiration 🕔 

- Completely customizable application, you choose everything, from music to animation, including durations and different sounds as well as transition vibrations. 🎉



Thanks to the transition sounds and vibrations, you can practice  even without looking at your screen and wherever you want, even in the dark since the screen can be turned off!  👌

 

You are the master of the place and choose everything in the smallest detail, the application was thought  by users and for users of Cardiac Coherence . 🎉


 Why should you do cardiac coherence?  
 

Cardiac coherence is a fast and very effective practice for reducing stress and anxiety, and also allows long-term control of one's emotions.
The goal of heart coherence could not be simpler, it is enough to breathe following cycles of 5 seconds of inspiration for 5 seconds of expiration. However, if you want to change this you can in the application. You can change the duration of inspiration and expiration to the second you want to adapt the application entirely to your needs. In the long term, cardiac coherence brings significant benefits as for the practice of meditation. Among other things, there will be a reduction in symptoms of depression, and a reduction in blood pressure.
For the immediate many effects will be felt, this is why the practice of cardiac coherence to many followers. 

 Here are some of its immediate effects:  

- Physical and mental soothing. 😎 

- Better sleep. 💤 

- Increase in the amplitude of cardiac variability. 💖 

- Decreased cortisol (stress hormone, lots of negative effects at a high rate). 📉 

- Increased secretion of DHEA (anti aging). 📈 

- Improved memory and coordination. 🧠 

- Increased secretion of serotonin. 🤗 


Cardiac coherence is an excellent introduction to meditation, but also a very good complement to it.
Ideally, it is recommended to do 3 cardiac coherence sessions per day, that makes 15 minutes of practice. It is really little compared to the benefits of practicing it. You can for example do a session in the morning when you wake up before going to work, another at noon to mark the break, as well as a last one when you come home in the evening to relax from your day.
Finally, these are only our recommendations, it's up to you to build your own program according to your needs and desires 🙂.
Do not forget the many benefits of the practice, this will allow you to keep yourself motivated constantly so as not to relax the practice.
We sincerely hope that you will like the application, it was designed with simplicity and beauty to satisfy each of our users.
We remain at your disposal to improve our application, so do not hesitate to contact us and especially to leave a note to thank us for the work on the application ☺️.

title: Signs of Anxiety and Panic Attacks
description:
It is important to learn how to deal with panic attacks when they occur. Before panic attacks occur, it is good to know what causes them as there are many possible triggers. 

There are many feasible reasons that anxiety attacks manifest including stress and medical conditions to name a few. Because panic attacks are so wide ranging, many different treatments have been created to help. The treatment that you receive will depend upon several different factors related to you personally.

The triggers of the anxiety attack and the type of attack you have will determine the treatment needed. Another factor is how often you suffer from these panic attacks. Sometimes controlling the attack is as simple as acknowledging your fear.

This app contains relevant information on the diagnosis, symptoms and relief of panic and anxiety attacks.

summary: Recognize Panic and Anxiety Attack Symptoms and Tips for Relief

title: Anxiety Relief
description:
Anxiety Relief consists of a series of five exercises to assist with anxiety related symptoms and set goals to improve your life situation.

A bit of background, my name is Rohan and I started suffering anxiety after a hectic period in my life. As the symptoms got worse and worse, I struggled to leave the house. After some assistance from some fellow suffers, I have developed a repertoire of exercises to get me through the day and get better over time.

This app was developed in order to assist me bring these exercises into practice, especially when I have a panic attack in public such as on the train or at work. Personally, this has been an amazing companion on my road to healing and I wanted to share it with anyone else who is suffering.

I hope it is as beneficial for you as it has been for me!

NOTE: THIS APP IS NOT INTENDED AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR MEDICAL ADVICE. PLEASE CONSULT A HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL TO ADDRESS ANY MEDICAL SYMPTOMS.

title: Medito: Free Meditation, Sleep & Mindfulness ☀️
description:
100% Free Meditation App that will improve your 😇Mental wellbeing with the help of 🧘Guided Meditations, Breathing Exercises, Mindfulness Practices, 🎶Relaxing Sounds, and more.

With our app’s holistic approach, you can find guided and non-guided meditations from  Medito Foundation and various other organizations such as UCLA, Dhamma talks, and Audio Dharma, all of which are based on ancient as well as recent meditation techniques.
Just spend a few minutes of the day on this app using the various features and discover the life-changing benefits, positivity, and transformative effects of meditation in your life.

The app is made with the aim to guide you towards a happier & healthier life with the help of various features present in it. This app from  Medito Foundation will help everyone on their journey to practice gratitude, manage anxiety and stress, relax and find positivity.

✨About Medito Foundation:
Medito Foundation is a non-profit organization that believes - “Meditation can positively transform lives and no one should have to pay for it”. This foundation is dedicated to its purpose of helping people cope better with depression, stress, anxiety, and any other negative state of mind. Practicing meditation and mindfulness is known to help reduce anxiety & stress, enhance cognition, attention & memory, help you sleep better, improve mental health, focus, and general well-being. 

✨Prime Features:

📍Beginner and Intermediate Courses
🔸Beginner Course
The Beginner Course is carefully crafted for someone who has little or no meditation experience. Each session is designed to teach you the basics of mindfulness & meditation. These sessions include Mindfulness, Vipassana, Non-judgement, Mindful living, Science of meditation, Negative emotions, etc.


🔹Intermediate Course
These guided meditations are designed for anyone who has already learned the basics of mindfulness meditation and is interested in developing their practice further. The course will introduce concepts & philosophies that will help deepen the meditation practice. This course includes sessions on Spontaneity of thoughts, Consciousness, Anxiety & Stress management, Minimal living, Ego dissolution, etc.

📍Daily Meditation
A different meditation session each day to help develop a greater sense of awareness in the present moment with options to choose from various session lengths, background music, etc.

📍Sleep Meditation, Sleep Sounds & Sleep Stories
Good sleep is a cornerstone of wellbeing which helps to maintain the physical & mental health and these guided sleep meditations which include Mindful breathing, Visualization, Body Scan, Sleep Stories as well as Mantra for sleep meditation will definitely ease you into a peaceful & restful sleep by calming down your mind and unifying your thoughts.

📍Meditation for Stress & Anxiety Management
The sessions which include labeling thoughts, dealing with stressful situations, negative emotions, etc are designed to help you manage stress & anxiety. Mindfulness meditation can help in dealing with negative emotions by transforming the way we actually experience them which ultimately diminishes their power over us.

📍Meditation for Work Life Management
Meditation & mindfulness can have a transformative effect on all aspects of our lives. These sessions are specifically designed to help lead a happier and healthier work life. It covers topics such as managing conflict, improving productivity and confidence, staying focused & motivated while finding the perfect work-life balance.

Medito also includes a variety of other meditation content like - Breathing exercises, Meditation timer, Gratitude, Mindful Routines, Relaxing music, etc.

If you have any questions, please send an email hi@meditofoundation.org, or via twitter @meditoHQ.

Medito Foundation
meditofoundation.org

recentChanges:
Improved functionality for screen readers.
Fixed the after-session screen.
Updated some minor styles on the stats page.
Some other minor UI improvements.
comments: I love this app. It is the best one I have found, so far, which is really free. Other apps make this claim, but then block access to certain material unless a payment is made. As a fairly novice meditation practitioner, I found this app invaluable because there is a beginner's course and intermediate course. Following on from these courses there are a variety of packs for different situations. From daily meditations to managing stress or anxiety, for better sleep, for walking, e.t.c.

Wow, this app is 100% quality. There is content for every situation and it is free. For those of you who are tired by commercialization of meditation apps - this is an app for you. I like that there is a simple customizable timer. Although I don't understand what offline / online mode means in the context of it. Seems like the meditation track is streamed anyway. Developers, could you clarify what that feature does?

Hands down the best app I've ever had for meditation. I've used so many other apps but this one is the only app I've actually stuck to using. The interface is so seamless and so easy to use. And it's 100 percent free. No sneaky purchases or special meditation packs. That sort of transparency is much appreciated and I honestly wouldn't mind donating or paying. I don't know how to support you guys other than this, if there is literally any other way to help, let me know!

After trying several meditation apps (Simple Habit, Headspace, Atom, etc), I like Medito the most because it's simple, user-friendly, and beginner-friendly. All sessions are free and the selection is well curated, which I love because what frustrated me with other apps is that too many options can be overwhelming and having series wherein some episodes are free while others are paid can stunt one's growth. Their "Getting Started" collection is useful particularly for a newbie like me, as many of the other apps do not offer in-depth tutorials on what to expect and how to practice correctly. As a cherry on top, I like the options for background sound, especially Spring Field. The audio is balanced well with the voice, so it's not too loud nor soft, and it plays seamlessly. It seems like a small thing, but it's something that had bugged me and turned me off from other apps. If I had to nitpick - it would be wonderful if you can expand your collections under Sleep Meditation and Mantra Affirmations as they currently only have a handful each.

This is my first meditation app and I find it very well made. You can pick what kind of meditation you need as the sessions are divided into sections. The voices are very calming. I've been meditating for about 4 months now and I can see some improvement in managing my stress and being a nicer person in general. Thank you guys and keep up your work!

title: Anti Anxiety
description:
Do any of these statements sound familiar?
You worry too much.
You must drag yourself out of the bed every morning and often
wake up feeling sad for no obvious reason.
You’re disposed to making negative predictions.
You worry about the worst that could happen in any situation.
You take negative feedback very personally.
You’re your biggest critic.
You avoid people more than you should.
Anything less than perfection feels like failure.

If they do, then there’s a chance that you’re experiencing some degree of anxiety and/or depression. Unpleasant feelings are a part of our daily lives. They are there to teach us a lesson. Once we’ve learned our lesson, they often move on, but might come back with another lesson later.

As a result of these experiences, you’re likely to feel sad and stressed. These are perfectly normal emotions to go through from time to time. Everyone feels low and apprehensive about something or the other at some point in their lives. But when these unpleasant emotions begin to consume you, then you must act before it’s too late. Fortunately, these feelings can be healed. They can be made to shift to a more positive and constructive space. And we are here to help. The anti anxiety formula book has been written with especially this in mind. You will find a wide range of skills and tools to help manage and overcome your anxiety. This book is filled with questions that help you reflect and find answers for yourself. We urge you to give every practice a try before deciding on the ones that work best for you. On that note, we welcome you to our book titled, ‘the anti anxiety formula.’ We’ve had an enriching time creating this book and hope that experience translates to our readers too.

Anti anxiety Formula 1: Breathe
When you’re anxious, your mind can get caught up battling the thoughts ringing its head. You can become so consumed by the process of balancing your emotions that you fail to recognize the physical effects of it. There are some tell-tale signs which when addressed can instantly help bring down your anxiety. Your breathing is at the top of that list.

Anti anxiety Formula 2: Exercise
Your body is not meant to be stressed. It’s meant to be happy, healthy, and at peace. And so, when you get upset, your body is alarmed and responds by producing stress hormones. Exercise has proved to be very effective in burning these hormones.

Anti anxiety Formula 3: Listen to Music
Sound stimulates the mind and body. It can inspire you or upset you. When you’re upset, try and listen to music that soothes your mind. Listen to whatever makes you happy.

And more...

title: anxiety and stress routines
description:
Stress is a feeling of physical or emotional tension. It can come from any situation or thought that makes one feel frustrated, furious or nervous.

The cause of stress is the presence of a stressor, anxiety is the stress that continues after the stressor has already disappeared.

symptoms of too much stress:
- symptoms of diarrhea or constipation
- symptoms of bad memory
- symptoms of frequent aches and pains
- headache symptoms
- symptoms of lack of energy or concentration
- symptoms of sexual problems
- Rigid neck or jaw
- Tiredness
- Trouble sleeping or sleeping too much
- Stomach upset
- Use of alcohol or drugs to relax
- Weight loss or gain

Feeling anxiety occasionally is a normal part of life. However, people with anxiety disorders often have intense, excessive and persistent worries and fears about daily situations. Perform relaxation and breathing exercises promotes health.

These feelings of anxiety and panic interfere with daily activities, are difficult to control, are disproportionate compared to real danger and can last a long time.

We teach you many mental relaxation techniques and relaxation exercises so you can have peace of mind to control anxiety and stress.

Relaxation is very important in our life, having a daily tranquility favors our health, breathing exercises to control anxiety and stress.

It is good to have physical exercise routines, good eating routines, relaxation exercise routines, breathing control exercise routines, all these routines favor our physical and mental health.

Download this free application to improve your health, control your breath and the symptoms of stress and anxiety. Put in your life some healthy routines to improve your physical and mental health.

That things work for you !.

This requires a combination of your cognitive functions, your emotional state, your physiology and also, the way you relate to your family, your work situation and the environment in general.

title: Overcome Depression and Anxiety
description:
Depression drains your energy, hope, and drive, making it difficult to take the steps that will help you to feel better. But while overcoming depression isn’t quick or easy, it’s far from impossible. You can’t just will yourself to “snap out of it,” but you do have more control than you realize—even if your depression is severe and stubbornly persistent. The key is to start small and build from there. Feeling better takes time, but you can get there by making positive choices for yourself each day.
Dealing with depression requires action, but taking action when you’re depressed can be hard. Sometimes, just thinking about the things you should do to feel better, like exercising or spending time with friends, can seem exhausting or impossible to put into action. Download this application and read it for get more very good tips how to get rid of Depression and Anxiety. Also share this app with your friends and family those are in mental illness and need your help.

title: Qi Gong for Anxiety
description:
Stream or download these Qi Gong for Anxiety video lessons with Qigong Master Lee Holden. Small file size, free sample videos, and a single IAP to unlock all content.
•	Mirror-view beginner qigong moves to the left and right.
•	Low-impact, whole body exercise done sitting or standing.
•	No experience needed; beginner-friendly follow-along workout. 

Flow is a term used in Qi Gong when we feel at peace and relaxed within. 
Through the practice of Qi Gong, you can discover the flow for yourself. This routine is designed to give a you a mini-vacation. With continued practice, you’ll find yourself more relaxed, more resourceful, feeling lighter, and able to go with the flow.
The opposite of flow is stress and anxiety. If you are feeling anxiety in your life, you aren’t alone. Anxiety is one of the most common problems people face today. Qi Gong is a quick and easy solution to anxiety that comes from the inside out.
There’s a saying in Qi Gong, “Let your mind be clear like a mountain lake: reflective, free and open.” This routine will help you find that equanimity, where the body is relaxed
and the mind at peace. Join Qi Gong teacher and PBS favorite, Lee Holden, in this simple and easy to follow routine.
•	Transform anxiety into inner peace with moving meditations
•	Clear anxiety using simple breathing exercises
•	Release tension and stress with gentle stretching
•	Balance the nervous system with long, flowing movements

Qi-Gong means "energy-work". Qigong (chi kung) is the ancient art of building the body's Qi (energy) to a higher level and circulating it throughout the body for rejuvenation and health. Some Qigong is practiced sitting or standing still, while other Qigong can be a kind of moving meditation. This gentle Qigong exercise is a highly effective way to reduce stress, increase energy, enhance healing, and generally improve your quality of life.
      
    Qigong increases the quantity of energy in the body, and improves the quality of your circulation through energy pathways, known as meridians. Qigong is sometimes called "acupuncture without needles." 
     
    Similar to yoga, Qigong can stimulate the entire body deeply with low-impact movement and develop a stronger mind/body connection. The slow, relaxed movements are widely recognized for their health benefits, such as boosting your immune response, strengthening the internal organs, muscles, joints, spine, and bones, and developing abundant energy. A Qigong session makes one feel strong, centered, and happy. 
     
Qigong can be effective in helping people with insomnia, stress-related disorders, depression, back pain, arthritis, high blood pressure, and problems with the immune system, cardiovascular system, respiratory system, bioelectric circulatory system, lymphatic system, and digestive system.

Thank you for downloading our free app! We are striving to make the best possible video apps available.

Sincerely,
The team at YMAA Publication Center, Inc.
(Yang’s Martial Arts Association)

CONTACT: apps@ymaa.com
VISIT: www.YMAA.com
WATCH: www.YouTube.com/ymaa

title: Serenita - Stress & Anxiety
descriptionHTML:
Measure and lower your stress in 5 minutes a day.

Serenita™ is a clinically proven and internationally recognized App for measuring and lowering stress in five minutes a day. In June 2015, Serenita won the prestigious “Best Health App of the Year” award, given annually by the Doctors 2.0 Organization.

More about Serenita™:

Serenita™ by Eco-Fusion is an interactive, science-backed tool, designed to help you monitor & lower your stress anytime & anywhere. By using Serenita for 5 minutes a day, you will feel better, improve your long-term health and reduce the risk of serious illness. By lowering your stress, the app helps you reverse known conditions caused by stress, such as anxiety, weight gain, poor sleep, mild depression, poor focus, and low energy. By monitoring and treating your stress on a daily basis, Serenita™ provides insight into your stress patterns overtime, and strengthens your stress resilience.

Main Features:

- Stress level monitor;
- Personalized exercise designed to give you the biggest stress reduction per time spent;
- Real-time feedback to make sure you are following the exercise correctly;
- Quantified results that are tracked over time.
- Available 24/7
- Can be performed in a crowded elevator

How It Works:

- Place your index finger over your Phone’s back camera lens;
- Using advanced digital technology, Serenita™ analyzes blood flow and variances in heart & breathing rates - to calculate your stress level;
- Follow Serenita’s personalized breathing routine to immediately reduce your stress; this highly effective exercise, turns on your body’s natural “relax signal”, which shuts down the flood of stress hormones & replaces them with relaxation hormones & enzymes.
- See in real-time how your exercise affects your stress level;
- Feel much more relaxed;
- Get your session stats;
- View your historical stress trends and patterns.

Complete this process in just for 5 minutes daily, and feel your stress melt away.

A leader in the field of digital therapeutics, Eco-Fusion offers a drug-free, personalized approach to health-related lifestyle changes. Download Serenita™ now.
summary: A Clinically validated app that measures and reduces stress in 5 minutes a day.
comments: Very cool tool! Would love to see this program integrated with wearables as getting vital sign readings through the camera is not optimal! Otherwise i think it works really well.

title: Mindfulness.com Meditation App
description:
More than just a meditation app, Mindfulness.com is your daily mindfulness coach for reducing stress, anxiety and improving your sleep. Every day, you’ll receive personalized video coaching, paired with a mini-meditation that can be completed in just 10 minutes. You will also enjoy 100s of deep dive talks, courses and guided meditations from some of the world's most trusted mindfulness teachers.

Join 300,000+ people who are learning mindfulness differently. The secret? Micro-learning + world’s best teachers + genuine behavioral change. In just 10 minutes a day, we'll support your whole life on our unique learning platform - focusing on managing stress and anxiety, loving yourself, improving relationships, performance, happiness, vitality and of course, sleeping well.

- PERSONALIZED VIDEO COACHING

Every day, you’ll receive inspiring daily video guidance and friendly encouragement from a world leading mindfulness teacher who will share practical tools, stories and teachings for living mindfully.

- DAILY GUIDED MEDITATIONS

Meditation sessions available in lengths of 5, 10, 15 or 20 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to weave through your day.

- TRANSFORMATIONAL LIBRARY

Explore 100s of talks, courses and guided meditations to manage stress and anxiety, improve sleep, happiness and relationships.

- THE WORLD’S BEST TEACHERS

Listen to talks, courses and guided meditations from our library of leading authors, wisdom teachers and scientists such as Jack Kornfield, Tara Brach, Jon Kabat-Zinn, Susan Piver, Ram Dass, Kristin Neff and Thich Nhat Hanh.

- SLEEP MEDITATIONS

Guided bedtime meditations.

- MEDITATION TIMER

Customize your meditation length and background sounds.

- JOIN US IN ENDING THE MENTAL HEALTH CRISIS

When you invest in your wellbeing through Mindfulness.com, you're also helping our mission to end the global mental health crisis. We've already donated over $750,000 to non-profit organisations, and it's only just the beginning!

YOUR MINDFUL MENTORS

We’ve handpicked the highest quality, and most authentic, mindfulness teachers from around the world to be your daily guides for living a healthier and happier life. These include leading authors, wisdom teachers, professional educators and science-based practitioners.

- Cory Muscara, MA - Former monk. Mindfulness Advisor to The Dr. Oz Show. Instructor at University of Pennsylvania
- Melli O’Brien - Speaker. Writer and Renowned Mindfulness Teacher. Co-founder of Mindfulness.com. Host of The Mindfulness Summit, the world's largest mindfulness conference.

- Coming soon!
    - Rhonda Magee, JD - Author. Professor of Law, University of San Francisco
    - Shamash Alidina, MA - Teacher. Author of Mindfulness for Dummies
    - Kelly Boys - Author. Mindfulness Trainer for the United Nations
    - Vidyamala Burch - Author. Pain & illness Specialist. Founder of Breathworks

descriptionHTML:
More than just a meditation app, Mindfulness.com is your daily mindfulness coach for reducing stress, anxiety and improving your sleep. Every day, you’ll receive personalized video coaching, paired with a mini-meditation that can be completed in just 10 minutes. You will also enjoy 100s of deep dive talks, courses and guided meditations from some of the world's most trusted mindfulness teachers.

Join 300,000+ people who are learning mindfulness differently. The secret? Micro-learning + world’s best teachers + genuine behavioral change. In just 10 minutes a day, we'll support your whole life on our unique learning platform - focusing on managing stress and anxiety, loving yourself, improving relationships, performance, happiness, vitality and of course, sleeping well.

- PERSONALIZED VIDEO COACHING

Every day, you’ll receive inspiring daily video guidance and friendly encouragement from a world leading mindfulness teacher who will share practical tools, stories and teachings for living mindfully.

- DAILY GUIDED MEDITATIONS

Meditation sessions available in lengths of 5, 10, 15 or 20 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to weave through your day.

- TRANSFORMATIONAL LIBRARY

Explore 100s of talks, courses and guided meditations to manage stress and anxiety, improve sleep, happiness and relationships.

- THE WORLD’S BEST TEACHERS

Listen to talks, courses and guided meditations from our library of leading authors, wisdom teachers and scientists such as Jack Kornfield, Tara Brach, Jon Kabat-Zinn, Susan Piver, Ram Dass, Kristin Neff and Thich Nhat Hanh.

- SLEEP MEDITATIONS

Guided bedtime meditations.

- MEDITATION TIMER

Customize your meditation length and background sounds.

- JOIN US IN ENDING THE MENTAL HEALTH CRISIS

When you invest in your wellbeing through Mindfulness.com, you're also helping our mission to end the global mental health crisis. We've already donated over $750,000 to non-profit organisations, and it's only just the beginning!

Absolutely astounding meditation app. Just hearing Melli's voice telling me to breathe gave me the feeling of relief, the weight being lifted from my shoulders. That really put my mind at ease. Thank you.

title: Panic Buddy - End panic attacks
description:
Panic attacks are extremely distressing and often lead to significant impairment. If you suffer from panic attack, this app can provide some much needed relief. This app was conceptualized and built by a mental health professional.

We will help you 

1)Understand panic attacks.
2)Identify the physical and mental symptoms of panic attacks.
3)Identify your panic cycle.
3)Learn relaxation techniques - A breath trainer with voice prompts and a guided mindfulness exercise to help you stay grounded.
4)Journal your progress.
5)Quotes relating to anxiety appear on the home screen to help you stay motivated.

We take you through a step by step process to beat panic attacks via 6 sections.

In section one - We read about what panic attacks are and what our options are.

In section two - We introduce the physical symptoms of panic. There is a checklist you can fill here.

In section three - We talk about thoughts, cognitive distortions and safety behaviors. There is another checklist to fill here.

In the fourth section, we introduce the panic cycle with an example, you may enter your own panic cycle here.

In the next section, we introduce two very powerful relaxation techniques.

1)The breath trainer, which guides you with visuals and voice to take calm breaths. Relaxed breathing in one of the most effective means of terminating panic attacks.

2)A short, mindfulness-based grounding exercise that can quickly terminate panic attacks.

These will be our weapons against panic.

In section six we introduce our plan, with short instructions in regard to what to do before, during and after a panic attack. Putting all this together will help you effectively gain some relief from panic attacks.

The panic button will take you directly to the relaxation exercises. We also have a panic diary built-in. It will help you identify and review triggers, physical symptoms and coping strategies.


The panic button, accessible as soon as the app opens and on the home screen will serve as first aid for a panic attack, this is meant to provide you with instant panic attack relief. This app will remain free forever. This is the first release and we hope to improve it and add further features with your assistance.


We hope you beat your panic attacks. All the very best.

Update - You can now share your panic diary entry with a friend or therapist.

title: Anxiety Relief & Sleep Melodies
description:
You need relaxing melodies for lighter and better sleep?🎵 Anxiety Relief & Sleep
Melodies will help you with this.🎵 Do you want to feel more comfortable and more relaxed?🎵 Listen to this incredible list of melodies and enjoy yourself.💤

Enjoy a large variety of Anxiety Relief & Sleep Melodies that you can mix and combine to make sure that our content and techniques will help you overcome Insomnia, Tinnitus, Feeling moody, Bad mood, Mental exhaustion, Night-Time Anxiety and lower your Everyday Stress.
Anxiety Relief & Sleep Melodies brings great collection of HD relax melodies that can be mixed into the perfect relaxing ambiences.

If you’re seeking stress relief or anti anxiety help, you are not alone. Anxiety and depression affect millions and can make everyday life unbearable. 
 Do you struggle with some of your thoughts and emotions? Are you looking for ways to improve your emotional well-being? Moodpath is your 
personalized mental health companion and supports you in phases of stress, depression, and anxiety.
You're not feeling your best. You might call it stress, anxiety, depression, low mood, or something completely different. 
What you do know is that you want to do something about it.

When your anxiety is reduced, you may also notice an improvement in related symptoms like anger management, OCD, PTSD, or even panic attack relief. 
You have the power to relieve stress, anxiety and depression — see if hypnosis is right for you to unlock your own ability to live your life 
outside of the shadow of depression and anxiety!
 

 
Anxiety disorders are a group of mental disorders characterized by feelings of anxiety and fear, where anxiety is a worry about future events and 
 fear is a reaction to current events. These feelings may cause physical symptoms, such as a racing heart and shakiness. There are various forms of 
 anxiety disorders, including generalized anxiety disorder, phobic disorder, and panic disorder. While each has its own characteristics and symptoms,
 they all include symptoms of anxiety.This sound will help you to relief the anxiety symptoms. 
 
Mental health is the level of psychological well-being or an absence of mental illness. It is the state of someone who is "functioning at a satisfactory 
level of emotional and behavioral adjustment". From the perspectives of positive psychology or of holism, mental health may include an individual's 
ability to enjoy life and to create a balance between life activities and efforts to achieve psychological resilience.


Feel free to share Anxiety Relief & Sleep Melodies on Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, Telegram, Tumblr, Instagram, messengers and anywhere on the internet.
Listening to nature sounds is the most natural and healthy way to relax and improve your sleep.
In this app you will find the best instrumental music, incredible nature sounds, meditation music, nature music, harp music, birds sounds,  piano music, 
music for mind and much more. Download it and dive into the magical world of Relaxing Music.

Listen exclusively  Free Melodies, Contemporary Music , ringtones, alarm tones and sounds. 
Best Mobile Apps and APK Free Download! - New MELODIES & SOUNDS For Tablet, Smartphone & Mobile Phone.

✔️  You can set it as a melody / ringtone . 
✔️  You have 100 min to enjoy in Anxiety Relief & Sleep  Melodies.
✔️  You can set an notification sound and alarm.   
✔️  Social sharing button.
✔️  Melodies can be used without an internet connection.
✔️  It’s 100% free

📫 All sounds are copyright of their perspective owners. No copyright infringement is intended, and any request to remove one of the images will be honored.
You can send your suggestions to contact page or simply leave a comment. We read all of them.📫

title: Anxiety Test
description:
Discover psychological information about anxiety and take the test to measure your level of anxiety.

Do you feel anxiety in your day to day?

Do you have a personality prone to anxiety?

 Do you want to evaluate your anxiety level to know if you have a problem?

Find out if you have anxiety problems by taking the test now!

Psychology defines anxiety as an emotion that is accompanied by physical and psychological symptoms and that can generate problems in the life of the person who suffers from it.

When an intensity is exceeded that makes it intolerable or when it hinders the person's ability to adapt, anxiety can affect daily life and can become a problem.

When anxiety is experienced with a very high intensity or produces discomfort and deficiencies in a person's life, that is when anxiety becomes pathological and dangerous. Elevated anxiety will affect the person in her physique, in her mind and in her behavior.

Are your anxiety levels normal? Take the test now and evaluate your anxiety!

If you are one of the many people who have anxiety problems you should know that with proper care you can overcome it. If you can't make anxiety completely disappear from your life, you can learn to control it.

In this application you will find a questionnaire to quantify your anxiety and an information section about anxiety. Among the information in the application you will find tips to overcome and control your anxiety and anxiety attacks.

Anxiety manifests itself in humans in different ways. You may experience physical, psychological, or behavioral symptoms. Here is a list of anxiety symptoms, read them carefully and if you feel recognized in them you should take the test to assess your anxiety.

Physical Symptoms of Anxiety:

Sweating, dry mouth, dizziness, unstable balance. Tremors, muscle tension, headaches. Tachycardia or pain in the heart.

Alteration of the respiratory rhythm. Nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, constipation. Frequent urge to urinate, problems in sexual intercourse.

Psychological and behavioral symptoms:

Feeling of worry, anguish or overwhelmed. Fear of losing control, going crazy or feeling like you will die imminently.

Concentration difficulties or memory loss. Bad mood, nervousness, hopelessness. Avoidance of certain situations. Reduction or inhibition of body movements. Obsessions or compulsions.

Take the test now and find out if you have anxiety problems!

title: rTribe - Coaching for Anxiety/Addiction/Depression
description:
WHY R|TRIBE? Live connected! Feel better! Hope, Healing, & Help - No matter your circumstance. Timely professional support is available to help you change your life and improve your connection with your significant other, spouse, loved ones or family. Find your tribe, achieve true healing, reach your goals in a safe and supportive community.

KEY BENEFITS:
Online Support - Accessible, Affordable, Anonymous, & Secure
Expert Counselors and Coaches - For Your Specific Needs
Messaging and Video Options - Choice!  Try for Free!
Community - Join or Create Peer Support Groups.

WHAT IS R|TRIBE?
rTribe is the first counseling and habit change platform to offer an innovative smart-match solution (via our proprietary TribeMatch™ technology) to the best licensed therapists and certified coaches combined with world-class peer support, accountability and analytic insights. Finally, people can find affordable, ‘just in time’ support and experience deep transformation. rTribe connects people with themselves, their purpose, community, and professional care. 

rTribe empowers you to have secure, confidential, vulnerable and authentic conversations with counselors, coaches, and peers, turning personal struggles into strengths. Find the honesty, courage, and support you need to thrive!

HOW DOES R|TRIBE WORK?
It’s never been easier to get professional help. Within minutes, you can instantly be TribeMatched to the ideal licensed coach for your specific needs. Start with a “worry-free” 3-day trial securely connecting you via unlimited messaging and scheduled live video/voice sessions.

IS ONLINE COACHING EFFECTIVE?
Studies confirm the effectiveness of the online medium for making life changes. Tracking your progress through rTribe, sharing that with your friends, and getting support from your provider is a powerful combination to experience deep change.

It will require courage and commitment. By connecting with a safe professional who has the knowledge, care, and skills to help; you can finally find true healing and hope.

HOW MUCH DOES IT COST?
rTribe offers unlimited access to licensed professionals at a fraction of the cost of traditional support. There are no contracts whatsoever and you can cancel anytime.

Plans Offered (billed monthly):

Chat Sessions $37.50/week: 
Unlimited chat
1 Daily provider check-in

Chat & video counseling $49.25/week:
Unlimited chat
1 Daily provider check-in
1 Live 30-minute session per month

Premium Chat and Video Counseling $99/week
Unlimited chat
2 Daily provider check-ins
4 Live 30-minute sessions per month


WHO ARE THE PROVIDERS?
Providers on rTribe are independent contractors who’ve been screened to provide an exceptional quality of care. Providers are generally certified coaches. Licensed therapists may work as a coach.

IS R|TRIBE SECURE AND CONFIDENTIAL?
Yes! Your privacy and safety are the top priority for us. We use military/bank-grade encryption. Also, you can be completely anonymous. Your provider is committed to maintaining your privacy and confidentiality.


PREMIUM FEATURES
Everyone starts a 30-day free trial of our premium subscription. If you decide to subscribe, the service automatically renews and costs $5.99/month or $59.99/year (that’s 2 free months!). Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Play Store -> Account after purchase.

Premium features, you will get access to:
    • Track your and your friends’ detailed progress. 
    • Set your privacy level.
    • Keep mentors and recovery guides up to date on your progress via weekly emails.

WE ARE HERE FOR YOU!
- Provider Support Email - providersupport@rtribe.org
- Provider Application - https://www.rtribe.org/become-a-counselor/

I used to use this app all the time a few years ago and tried creating a new account and it won't let me

I downloaded this app but it has a sign-in problem i got irritated again again the same problem of sign-in whenever i enter my details and try to get in but it redirect to the same page of login.

title: Unburden – Anxiety, Stress, Depression Chat App
description:
Introduction –
Unburden is a community of people who are fighting Depression, Anxiety, Panic Attacks, Relationships issues etc. and want to talk to someone. Listeners can also sign up on unburden and help the people who are dealing with mental health issues.

You will always remain 100% anonymous on unburden and chat 1 – to – 1 with listeners any time. On Unburden, speak your mind without the feeling of being judged.

What it IS?
This depression chat app provides a safe and confidential space to all those who need to talk to someone about anxiety, depression, stress and loneliness, confine into someone but do not have access to professional psychologist, psychiatrist or therapists due to economic or social reasons. 
Here you can get help from all the kind hearted people around the world, or you can choose to help others get things off their chest.

We believe in community service, and unburden is just a medium of bringing sharers and listeners together. 

What this app is NOT
Unburden is not a replacement for professional Mental Health Experts, psychologist, psychiatrist or therapists. If you have requirement & have access to professional services then it is highly recommended that you visit them, Mental Health is Important!

Why we NEED it?
We Believe that everyone who needs help should get it. And all of us together can make this happen. We can atleast virtually be there for each other when we are feeling down (or jolly). Users are the core of unburden app. Users willing to help each other are what make this app what it is.
- Keeping things BOTTTLED UP is a very unhealthy practice
- Talking to people about what’s been stressing and worrying you will help you
- Comfort of having someone to share thoughts with is of healing nature

Who Needs it?
WHO NEEDS UNBURDEN – ANTI DEPRESSION APP?
1. People who require support to deal with 
- Depression
- Anxiety
- Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
- Panic attacks
- Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
- Mood disorders
- Stress 
- LGBTQ
- Gender identity crisis
- anything which is not good for your mental health
2. People who feel lonely and are hesitant to reach out due to social stigma and economic concerns.
3. People who have saviors in them and love to help community, they can join as listeners, because all heroes don’t wear capes.
4. People who want to speak their mind without worrying of being judged.

Confidentiality and Privacy
"Confidentiality" and "Privacy" are two of the main Pillars of this app. We have taken all the necessary measures to ensure that nothing hampers your privacy (we respect your privacy) and once you complete sign-up process, only thing we will know about you is your 'username'.
Your email-id and password are encrypted in a way that even we ourselves can't decrypt it.
- We won't know your email-id so you will never receive any annoying promotional emails.
- Your chats will NEVER be stored.
- We will NEVER share your username with anyone.

title: Sleep stories for calm sleep & meditation by Wysa
description:
Sleep by Wysa is your go-to sleep app when you want to sleep well. If you want to get deep sleep but can’t, because of a negative thought or worries troubling your mind, sleep mindfulness by Wysa is here to give you some headspace & provide any sleep aid that you need to sleep better. Sleep stories including bedtime stories help you breathe, calm down and free you from stress and meditations help you with sleep relaxation. Relieve stress, have a restful sleep, relax and calm with all the tools that are provided by this sleep relaxation app.

Listen to a different sleep story every day to fall asleep. Sleepytime tales are the best things that could happen when sleep is miles away from your eyes and you are not sleepiest. Relive the comforting nostalgia of bedtime stories with sleep stories for grown ups as they help you drift into sleep. 

Studies show that writing a diary at bedtime can help you clear some headspace, think positively and that can be a real sleep booster which can help you sleep better and fall asleep quickly. Practicing gratitude before going to sleep can provide you a good night’s sleep and a morning with positive energy and a hopeful frame of mind.

Put your restless sleep to an end with free sleep melodies and sleep sounds. Sleep melody works wonders when you want your sleep restore your body’s energy. Wysa’s Sleep as Android app which includes sleep white noise is one of the best sleep meditation and sleepings apps free. If you are looking for the best sleep apps and sleepings apps, then you have found the right one for deep sleep.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

✨ Featured for World Mental Health Day - in 2018 and 2019

😎 Has helped more than 1 million people

📝 Use CBT-i for insomnia and journaling to sleep well

Sometimes we get tangled inside our heads, and negative thoughts don’t let us sleep at bedtime even when we are feeling sleepiest. Wysa can help you rethink those thoughts with CBT tools for insomnia and adhd. Wysa already has helped more than a million people successfully break the cycle of negative thinking by helping them reframe those thoughts. A touch of positivity before going to sleep can have a impact for deep sleep.

Mindfulness starts with breathing. Breathing exercises are one of the most underrated techniques to be calm, which you will get in this mindfulness sleep app free.

Deep sleep sounds good when sleep deprivation kicks in. Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for insomnia (CBT-I) is a proven technique that can do wonders for insomnia and adhd. Don’t believe us? Try it yourself. For extra support, you can avail of guidance from psychologists - Wysa Sleep. Coaches who can help you deal with different issues related to sleep using CBT-I. Sessions with sleep coaches will be aimed at moving towards healthier bedtime sleep habits and finding strategies that will work for you.

- Have a look at how Wysa can help you improve your sleep quality when you are sleepiest

- Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of mindful sleep meditation free

- Wysa’s calm sleep booster app helps to get better sleep and head space

- Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) to sign off the day on a high note

- 30+ coaching tools which help in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

- Wysa is the calm app you need for meditation and sleep. It helps you to stop, breathe & think, making it an effective sleep booster

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness & practice breathing techniques. Use Wysa to meditate and stay calm

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships that are not letting you sleep: special mindfulness and visualizations like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations

comments: This app is amazing. It help me improve my sleeping schedule and my insomnia is getting better. The stories and guided meditations work like magic. The moment I turn it on, my body resets itself. It help me go into a deep slumber which I cant remember when last I had one. I really recommend this app. It is awesome.

This is the very best app. I have found for sleep. I never reach the end of the "Sleep Stories" which is the whole point - wonderful! I have only just started using this app. and am very interested in exploring your other options. You seem to offer an Holistic approach for well being. Thank you.

I gave this app 5 starts because it provides all the necessities, sleep stories, sleep music, excersises and more. There is also a sleep stories of the day which allows you to listen to stories that are only for plus so if you can't get plus you can still listen to a variety of stories without paying the price! Highly recommend.

I love it. I found the perfect family home to raise my kids in though it has one major factor I thought I could never get used to... it's right next to the train line where at night quite frequently a loud horn sounds to prevent someone being hit if they are crossing the tracks. Without this app I dont think I could have gotten to sleep at all so it is my life saver and I completely love it. Thank you for being the solution to my worries. Sleep is vital and we all deserve the best.

After we got into our tailored to me sessions, I found I felt a little better and lighter each time. My one little drawback was that I could not get a question answered for me regarding how I will be receiving daily reminders. I had hopes it could be an alarm but I still don't know how I will receive my 6:45 am reminder. Any thoughts there I would appreciate an email with the answer! I think this can be a great tool in a wide array of personal areas. I also appreciate the anonymity.

title: Carpe Diem - Depression and Anxiety Forum
description:
Life is a two way street - extreme as one may say and mental illness feels like a punch in the gut at times. Where staying calm and having focus is blanketed by ideas of self doubt, sadness and suicide. Mental illness is not a taboo but like any illness needs a hearing soul and a community - a sense of belonging and being understood. 
At Carpe Diem we provide you with a platform to indulge in self care, to talk about anything and everything that has been bothering you. 
Building a community to beat stress and thoughts of sadness and providing you aid and a healthy lifestyle style by the people who have witnessed the same 
Let us cancel the purging thoughts of helplessness and hopelessness by binding together and finding tranquility, hope and liberty

Carpe diem is an anonymous forum for people having depression and anxiety.
Carpe diem is a safe, supportive space for anyone struggling with depression and anxiety. Our forum is completely anonymous. We advice users to have a anonymous username. Let's support each other.

Please give your valuable feedback at photonapps@gmail.com

Follow us - https://twitter.com/Photonapps

Like us-https://www.facebook.com/photonapps

title: CBT Buddy : Anxiety & Stress
description:
Stress, anxiety and fear can block your well-being. Cbt Buddy is a simple tool inspired by cognitive-behavioral psychotherapy that helps you remedy anything that may unconsciously block you to achieve your goals.

Your anxieties and fears block your true potential and eventually generate negative reactions.

This simple and targeted method will help you become stronger and overcome your moments of anxiety.

You only have to answer 6 questions to clarify your mind and regain confidence and balance.

Disclaimer: this application does not replace professional help.

title: Anxiety Management
description:
There are a myriad of alternative actions for coping with anxiety and in this application, a few of them are mentioned. Purpose of this application is to act as an pocket-book, which can easily remind of various alternative approaches to face the difficult state of mind.

However, the anxiety should not be avoided indefinitely, because encounter may be an important step to overcome it.

Methods in this application are mainly for minor or moderate anxiety. If you consider yourself to be at risk of self-destruct, get help from your health care services. Do not stay alone.

title: Relax Melodies: Sleep Sounds
description:
Can’t sleep at night?  Relax Melodies is designed to be the most efficient Sleep-Aid App  to make you fall asleep quickly and wake up refreshed. Relax, take a deep breath and join us on a restful journey to sleep!

Enjoy a large variety of Nature Sounds, White Noise, Guided Meditations, Bedtime Stories, Brainwaves, Body-Mind Exercises and Breathing Techniques that you can mix and combine to create your very own Bedtime Experience. We collaborate with Sleep Experts to make sure that our content and techniques will help you overcome Insomnia, Tinnitus, Night-Time Anxiety and lower your Everyday Stress.

You’ll fall back in love with sleep by joining our community of 50 million happy sleepers we help calm, fall asleep, and relax every night. Sweet dreams!

FEATURING:
Large sound library
Guided Meditation Programs & Sleep meditations
Bedtime Stories for everyone
Sleep Moves with or without your pillow
Breathing techniques
And more!

People love Relax Melodies:
Editors’ choice on Google Play
**Voted best Health and Fitness app** — MUX 2018
** It’s like a GPS directing you how to fall asleep ** — The Guardian
**Best app for insomnia** — Healthline


🌖Sleep Sounds, Brainwaves, & White Noises:
Explore our selection of over 200 soothing sounds, music, beats, and tones designed specially by our in-house experts to lull you to sleep. Mix them together to create your very own soundscapes:

Library includes :
* Nature sounds: wind, rustling leaves, birds, crackling fire
* White noise: hair dryer, airplane, dryer, vacuum, fan noise
* Water sounds: rainstorm, ocean, slow waves, lapping water
* Meditation music: voices, instruments, ambient melodies
* Isochronic Brainwaves: 2.5Hz, 4Hz, 5Hz, 8Hz, 10Hz, 20Hz
* Binaural Beats: 2.5Hz, 4Hz, 5Hz, 8Hz, 10Hz, 20Hz…

🌖Guided Meditation Programs & Sleep Meditations:
Add a sleep meditation to your soundscape to quiet your mind and guide you to a deep slumber. Choose over 160 meditations created especially to help you relax and drift to sleep.

Themes included :
* Restful sleep
* Falling Back Asleep
* Visualization
* Gratitude
* Tinnitus relief
* Stress and Anxiety relief
* Deep sleep
* Napping
* The realms of Dreams...

🌖Bedtime Stories
Embark on a journey with our Bedtime Stories narrated with soothing voices and written specially to send you to dreamland.

Themes included :
* Fairytale
* Mystery
* Sci-fi
* Fantasy
* Non-fiction


🌖SleepMoves: Move. Breathe. Sleep
Experience our SleepMoves, a series of body-mind exercises and relaxation techniques developed in collaboration with sleep professionals. Let yourself be guided through gentle movements easing you into a deep sleep.


* Mini: to help you unwind quickly
* Together: Enjoy unwinding as a couple with this relaxation routine
* Travel: Overcome jet-lag and homesickness
* Cooldown: Drain excess energy
* Harmony: Find your balance and recenter yourself
		

🌖Breathing Techniques: Sound Breathing for Day and Night
Achieve specific goals such as reducing your anxiety or clearing your mind with our Sound Breathings. Blending breathing exercises with soothing sounds, they will melt your worries away!

Topics included :
* Take a Break
* De-Stress
* Clear your mind
* Fall asleep

Also featuring:
Bedtime reminder: Set one every night to get more restful sleep
Timer: Stop the application after a set amount of time
And more!

...

recentChanges: Hello Sleepers! Wash away your worries with the help of our new water sounds. Studies have shown that nature sounds, especially water sounds, are effective at lowering stress levels. In honour of World Mental Health Day, we wanted to bring you the calming power of water. Enjoy our 10 new water sounds and sleep well.
comments: Deeper sleep than with any other sounds. We've used a box fan in our room for years to help us sleep. I downloaded this app and used it on a vacation when we didn't have room to pack the huge box fan. Using a combination of white, brown, and other noises, including the Dreams frequency, we slept deeper than we could remember ever having slept before. Now we use this all the time and consistently wake up feeling nicely rested. The paid version is so worth it because of the dream frequency.

I used to use this back when it was just a webpage, and it's helped so much with my anxiety and night terrors. This kind of app is deeply helpful for people like me. I love it, it's incredible, but I'm SO disappointed at the fact that premium is a SUBSCRIPTION and the outrageous price for it. If there was an option to purchase a certain package, like specific sounds, I'd have rated this the 5 stars it should have. I don't need new content every week. Unfortunately, it gets a 3.

Wonderful! I used this a long while ago and decided to come back to it. I've been using the isochronic sounds for a while and they've actually helped! But i hear a LOT of static when i use them. I'm not sure if its an app problem or maybe phones arent meant to run such a low tone but its gotten a bit worse. Other than that the sounds are all perfect and just what i need with the free version.

It's a lifesaver. You don't need cell service or wifi to use it, so no matter where you are you can have a waterfall, a campfire, and some peaceful music (or whatever noises you want) for free. It uses very little battery as well and will play in the background if you're using other apps. There are some noises you have to upgrade for, but for the most part, it's free, loud, and doesn't have audible looping. Thank goodness for this app.

I really like the 'eternity' sound but every time I turn it on, there's this static noise that pops up. Its very distracting. I thought it might be my phone but I turned on the same music on YouTube and Spotify and there was no static, so it's definitely the app. I would like to continue using it on the app because it plays on and on but I don't want the static noise.

title: eQuoo: Emotional Fitness Game
description:
What happens when a psychologist teams up with the creators of The Walking Dead games? Introducing eQuoo, an EVIDENCE-BASED and captivating choose-your-own-adventure game that increases your emotional fitness and teaches you new psychological skills, helping you level up in real life. 

Become a master people person by learning tips and tricks about emotion and effective communication. Our clinical trial showed that a level a week builds resilience, boosts relationship skills, supercharges your personal development AND lowers anxiety! These key skills will help you take control of your life, maintain your mental health and achieve success in work and relationships. Put your newfound knowledge to the test in engaging mini-games designed to help you understand your personality and identify your areas for growth and personal development. Download now for free!

FEATURES: 
- Evidence-based through a clinical trial 
- Significantly builds resilience - the strongest predictor against developing mental health issues
- Boots interpersonal relationships skills - become the people person you want to be and wow friends, family, and partners
- Supercharges personal development - get ahead in work and uni
- Lowers anxiety - eQuoo gives you skills to help challenge anxious thought patterns
- Apply your new skills in choose your own adventure games to unlock insights about your personality and progress to the next level
- Learn where you lie on the Big Five measures of personality and what this means for you

Download eQuoo for FREE to discover your inner power.

recentChanges: Made some updates and took care of bugs
comments: I have only just started this game but from what I have seen and played so far I am very impressed, not only with how it is layed out but also how it explains things to you and you get to make choices on how you would react and explains your answers to you.. I have learnt about myself already.. Thank you for a great app..

I haven't yet played it much, so cannot give it full marks. Will review again at a later date. So far though, graphics, game play, speed, storyline, etc are all good. It even gives you psychology tips and assessment information on your profile. It'd be good to see what I make of it once I search up all the terms they have mentioned.

It's a good app to explore what the big five personality types are but I do not think it's a good representation of what your big five results actually are. The testing is from a multiple choice storyline where some of the answers are in a right/wrong format. It also claimed to be based from clinical research, which in turn does not make it good or bad

Good idea, poor execution. The writing needs a lot of work. Most of the answers are ridiculous, and some of the "right answers" seem socially inept -- which works against the whole point of this game. For example, why would you need to tell a suspect that you're not the "best chief of security"??? The personality test questions also lead to wrong conclusions, because they're not based on what you would choose in real life, but what you think the character you're playing as should choose.

I appreciate the art style and how the education is not too text book. It seems culturally relevant and easy to follow. The lessons are easy to understand and I appreciate the practice that comes after. Immersive experience of trying to get it right using the tools learned is really cool.

title: Anxiety Relief Apps Guide
description:
Anxiety Relief Apps Guide

Are you constantly afraid, worried, or perhaps nervous? Do you have trouble sleeping, or always feel tired and panicky? Do you often wonder why you can't stop worrying and why you're still fearful? Do you wish you could overcome these issues so you can start living the life you want?

These types of feelings and emotions are often diagnosed as anxiety. These feelings of worry and fear are a normal reaction of the brain that is a result of many factors that are causing an imbalance or challenge to our daily routine. Everyone deals with moments in their life when they feel like the world is about to fall apart on us. During these moments, it can be difficult to describe the feelings of tension, helplessness, and anxiety that is running rampant through our minds. We feel that we would be ecstatic if
 
we could simply disappear and emerge when stressful situations in our lives have passed.

While this is a completely normal reaction to stressful situations, there are times when these emotions and thoughts become so common that they start to have a major impact on our lives. When this happens, you have crossed the line from normal into   abnormal. If your feelings of fear  become  so  frequent  a debilitating that you have difficulties performing even the most  basic of physical activities, then it is a much more serious problem that needs to be addressed. Many people experience this  condition, known as an anxiety disorder.  Generally  speaking,  if our reactions to certain situations are much more grandiose than the response of others, then you might be suffering from an   anxiety disorder.

Fortunately, if you are suffering from an anxiety disorder, there is hope that you can be successfully treated and start to live a   normal life once again. An experience that is free of constant fear, worry, and anxiety. By making some simple changes in your lifestyle and daily routine, you can start to overcome your anxiety and finally be free of the debilitating effects of the condition.

Features:

anxiety causes

anxiety treatment

types of anxiety disorders

anxiety depression

anxiety quotes

anxiety medication

generalized anxiety disorder

Panic Attack Treatment

Download NOW!!

title: Dealing With Anxiety Guide
description:
Dealing With Anxiety is an application that provides solutions and opinions to you that Dealing With Anxiety is Life can be difficult for everyone at times, but if you suffer from anxiety issues, it's simply unbearable. Fear and anxiety can take complete control of your life and make you miserable. 

Medications are one of the most common methods to treat anxiety. On the other hand, most of the prescription drugs for anxiety can cause adverse side effects. For some cases, it can even worsen the condition. Moreover, it actually depends on the person who is using the medication, some may be successful but some may not. It can also cause medication dependency, which is not good.

in this app we will discuss:


Dealing with depression
Fight Depression Naturally

Feature on the app

_ A very simple look in the app


little explanation about Dealing With Anxiety : 


Health issues can make your life worse and hence they must be paid due attention. There are certain health complications that show their adverse effects at once. On the other hand, there are those that gradually build up and turn into something serious even before you know about it. Anxiety is one such disorder that can turn into a monster if you do not take measures to deal with it. Panic and anxiety disorders trouble millions of people worldwide. In the US alone 2.4 million Americans are affected by it. Anxiety is related to stress and is a psychological and physiological state where the person feels disturbed emotionally and mentally. Most of the people also refer to this complication as 'slow poisoning'. You should ideally be aware of the aspects that will help you deal with anxiety. Dealing with anxiety is not a very difficult process, especially if you happen to follow the right methods.


In most cases, anxiety treatment methods take a while before they start showing results. It might take weeks or even months before you get rid of anxiety completely. However, till the time you do not get free completely from this disorder, you need to deal with it. So, how to deal with anxiety? There are different ways of dealing with anxiety. It is important to stick to the ones that have been very effective and successful.


Ideally, you should look for natural remedies for anxiety. For instance - it makes sense to indulge in meditation on a regular basis. According to experts, meditation helps an individual to relax. It is important to relax in order to get rid of anxiety. Similarly, experts also recommend yoga. Yoga is undoubtedly one of the best and most effective forms of exercise. It has fantastic impact on not just your physical aspect but your mental well-being as well. Thousands of people indulge in yoga on a daily basis. Even a 30 minutes yoga session can be extremely effective. It will not only help you get over anxiety but also keep you fit and calm. So, you must do t regularly for best results.

title: Calm Harm - manages self harm
description:
Calm Harm provides tasks to help you resist or manage the urge to self-harm. Get started by setting your password so that it's completely private. 
You can personalise it if you wish, by choosing the background colour theme and deciding on whether you would like some company using a variety of friendly characters. 

The app then provides you with four categories of tasks to help you surf the urge. ‘Distract' helps in learning self-control; ‘Comfort' helps you care rather than harm; 'Express yourself' gets those feelings out in a different way and ‘Release' provides safe alternatives to self-injury. 

There is also a ‘Breathe' category to help calm and get back in control. 

You can do the activities for either blocks of five minutes or fifteen minutes with a countdown for each minute. You will be able to track your progress and notice change*. 

Calm Harm has been developed for stem4 by Dr Krause, Consultant Clinical Psychologist using the basic principles of an evidence based treatment called Dialectic Behaviour Therapy (DBT)

(*Please note the app is an aid in treatment but does not replace it.)

comments: I love this app a lot! I see nothing wrong with it. And it's very creative, when I downloaded this app there was a passcode and if you don't remember it, you may reset it by awnsering a simple question.. I do not remember what I put so I had to uninstall and reinstall but that is my fault 5/5 stars

They responded to my comment VERY fast and made it so that I could use the app again! I love this app because it helps me relieve my stress and keeps me safe. I would recommend this app to anyone who struggles with the urge to self-harm because it works wonders for me. If you struggle with the urge to self-harm, PLEASE consider this app!

The app has an amazing selection of helpful activities, however for some reason it struggles to load up initially, as well as loading up things like the log. I've restarted my phone, force closed the app and reopened it, my next option is reinstalling it but if that doesn't work then I'm forced to try other apps, which may not give me nearly as many options for calming myself down so I don't self harm.

Hiya! I just wanna drop by and thank you for making all these mental health apps. I rarely ever see good mental health apps like this and I'm just so thankful that you guys are doing it. Self harm is a very serious struggle and I'm glad that there's more apps to help with it. I'm espically glad that you are making it free because lots of people can't pay for it and by making free, you guys are helping so many more people. Thank you for helping out and spreading more awareness!!! <3

It's great but could you maybe make a 'hide' function? That would be awesome because a lot of people judge when they see apps like this on my phone. So could you maybe have an option to disguise it, like say a calculator.

title: Anxiety Help
description:
Would you like to be calm, content , gain confidence, relax, have control of your life again and achieve your work duties and social goals!

With this app, we have compiled ancient remedies for anxiety. We give you only the successful ones. Here is the table of contents:

--What is anxiety?
--Anxiety symptoms 
--Herbal cures
--Chinese herbal cures
--Ayurveda
--Homeopathic remedies
--Bach Flower remedies
--Aromatherapy
--Vitamins and minerals as support

How to use this app?

There are three important buttons:

-- Your Therapy

-- Symptoms

-- Description of remedies 

First tap on Symptoms and then tap on one or more icons that say Add to Your Therapy. You will see a short message ("toast") that the symptom is entered into the therapy.

You can select all symptoms that you want now or later, it does not matter. Once entered, you will be able to delete the chosen symptom with a click of a button.

Then tap on various groups of remedies. Typically, these will be Homeopathy, Bach Flower remedies, Ayurveda and others. Visit these therapies and tap on icon to select the remedy and enter it into the chosen therapy.

Finally, tap on Your Therapy. You will see a list of symptoms (in orange) mixed with a list of remedies (green) that you have selected. Taken together, the symptoms and the remedies form your therapy. Now all you have to do is obtain the remedies and start the process of eventual improvement of your health.

The whole process takes less than five minutes but will cut down the time to search for remedies. We have chosen only the proven remedies from various types of healing so let this be a firm base for further research of yours. In the meantime, you undertook the first step towards the change of your life.

If the symptoms change, you may repeat the entire process.

The app is free and is supported by (hopefully non intrusive) ads. This app belongs to a wider group of apps that may be able to help you improve your health. Please visit the option Other apps to see what else do we have.

Would you like to be calm, content , gain confidence, relax, have control of your life again and achieve your work duties and social goals!

With this app, we have compiled ancient remedies for anxiety. We give you only the successful ones. Here is the table of contents:

--What is anxiety?
--Anxiety symptoms
--Herbal cures
--Chinese herbal cures
--Ayurveda
--Homeopathic remedies
--Bach Flower remedies
--Aromatherapy
--Vitamins and minerals as support

How to use this app?

There are three important buttons:

-- Your Therapy

-- Symptoms

-- Description of remedies

First tap on Symptoms and then tap on one or more icons that say Add to Your Therapy. You will see a short message ("toast") that the symptom is entered into the therapy.

You can select all symptoms that you want now or later, it does not matter. Once entered, you will be able to delete the chosen symptom with a click of a button.

Then tap on various groups of remedies. Typically, these will be Homeopathy, Bach Flower remedies, Ayurveda and others. Visit these therapies and tap on icon to select the remedy and enter it into the chosen therapy.

Finally, tap on Your Therapy. You will see a list of symptoms (in orange) mixed with a list of remedies (green) that you have selected. Taken together, the symptoms and the remedies form your therapy. Now all you have to do is obtain the remedies and start the process of eventual improvement of your health.

The whole process takes less than five minutes but will cut down the time to search for remedies. We have chosen only the proven remedies from various types of healing so let this be a firm base for further research of yours. In the meantime, you undertook the first step towards the change of your life.

If the symptoms change, you may repeat the entire process.

The app is free and is supported by (hopefully non intrusive) ads. This app belongs to a wider group of apps that may be able to help you improve your health. Please visit the option Other apps to see what else do we have.
summary: Try to relieve anxiety by using alternative medicine methods from this app.

title: Guided Meditation Masters: Daily Mindfulness Focus
description:
It is confirmed through thousands of years worth of ancient wisdom that meditation reduces stress, calms the mind and increases inner peace. Studies have proven that meditation can give the body deep rest that is deeper than the rest from that of sleep.

Regular meditation is proven accumulate deep rest in the body over time, and it is that deepening reservoir of rest that reduces stress and results in the many benefits of muscle tension, improved circulation, energy, focus, inner peace, and an overall better quality of emotions.

Stress accounts for over 60% of doctor visits. Meditation can lower blood pressure, cholesterol and the risk of heart disease and stroke, can help relieve stress, depression, insomnia, sleeplessness, anxiety and worries, and can increase productivity, learning, happiness, well being and inner peace. 

Drastically change the quality of your life by following the curated collection of top quality meditation courses focused on healing, stress and anxiety reduction, sleep and more. The courses will help any seeker at any level of experience, whether they're new to meditation, exposed to it or a daily practitioner.

title: Bust Anxiety
description: Bust ANXIETY App is a new Approach to treat ANXIETY Disorder. It is developed in Canada by CCEI Psychotherapy & Research Inc. for Android phones and Tablet users. This app is designed to help people and specially Veterans who are living with ANXIETY Symptoms or have experienced Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. Bust ANXIETY App helps to reduce ANXIETY symptoms in a cost effective and time efficient manner. The beauty of Bust ANXIETY App; No Disclosure of Personal Information Required, No Need to Work Around Schedules for Appointment, it's Affordable, Reduces Symptoms and Improves Quality of Life. Bust ANXIETY App may also help people to deal with Depression and others symptoms complex, because untreated ANXIETY can be a contributing factor in a variety of mental health issues or conditions. Bust ANXIETY App helps to resolve underlying causes of these conditions and their associated symptoms. Bust ANXIETY App works on ANXIETY symptoms at neurological level; this app reduces avoidance behaviour, fear & worry, Irritability & edgy feeling, restlessness, sleep disturbance, muscle tension, fatigue and mind going blank in most of the cases, a typical ANXIETY symptoms complex according to DSM-5. This treatment approach is based upon Cognitive Behaviour Therapy, Behaviourist Approach, Somatic or Body Oriented Therapeutic Approach, Yoga and Meditation’s Grounding Techniques and Imagery Techniques. Bust ANXIETY App helps to deal with maladaptive and learned behaviour patterns; it lays down the foundation for a healthy, and happy life. It is evidence based and has shown remarkable results for people who have lived through Anxiety causing experiences or still experience Anxiety in their day to day life, like dental work, exam anxiety for students, fear of public speaking, doing or starting new things or facing certain situation. We assure that, you will never feel the same way about Anxiety Provoking Situations after using Bust ANXIETY App.
