title: Simple Habit: Meditation, Sleep
description:
Simple Habit is #1 app for your wellness & sleep recommended by top psychologists, therapists and mental health experts. Try Simple Habit for free today and join over 5 million people on this life-changing journey. Sleep better and be happier in your life, marriage, parenthood, work, and health.

Our wellness & sleep therapy sessions offer guided mindfulness & meditation, daily motivation, guided sleep sessions and coaching by world-renowned experts, personalized for the way you live your life. We’ll help you feel less stressed, get better sleep and be your best self whether you have 5 minutes in the morning, 20 minutes during your commute or need to fall asleep quickly. Start your Simple Habit for free today and live better every day.

----

FEATURED ON
* 2018 Google Play Awards Standout Well-Being App Winner
* 2018 Google Material Design Awards Winner
* 2017 Google Play's Best Apps Winner
* Shark Tank Season Premiere 2017

WHY SIMPLE HABIT?

MINDFULNESS AND MEDITATION
• Just 5-minutes of mindfulness and meditation per day can improve your life through stress relief and improved sleep
• New meditation guided by the world’s best experts, from mindfulness experts at Google to former monks
• Track your progress and stay motivated with Mindful Minutes
• Access meditations offline with Premium subscription so you can meditate at any time

WELLNESS FOR YOUR BUSY LIFESTYLE
• Perfect for busy lifestyles— listen when you wake up, while driving or go to sleep
• Sessions designed for life’s daily problems
• Use Simple Habit's On-the-Go feature to quickly calm your anxiety to achieve a sense of mindfulness

HEALTH AND RELAXATION
• Sleep better
• Relieve stress
• Manage anxiety and depression
• And more

FIND MOTIVATION
• Coaching content
• Motivational talks
• Streak tracking and mindful minutes to track your progress

BENEFITS OF USING SIMPLE HABIT
• Build a meditation habit
• Get a better night’s sleep
• Motivation in your pocket
• Improve focus
• Reduce stress and anxiety
• Stay calm and relaxed
• Increased self-awareness
• Be an effective leader
• Breathe deeper and easier
• Increased sense of perspective
• Achieve mindfulness on the go
• Calm down and relax at the end of a long day
• Tackle different life challenges in a calm, focused manner
• Improve relationships
• Be happier, more relaxed, and calm

GET UNLIMITED ACCESS WITH PREMIUM
Simple Habit offers two auto-renewing subscription options to help you achieve mindfulness and breathe easier. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your Play Store account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Play Store account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when a subscription is purchased. These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

recentChanges:

comments: Love this app. I could be better at using it every day. But, even just using when I feel it's needed always helps calm my mind. If you are into meditation and bettering your mind and calming your body, it helps me do that. I like the Cory guy the best, he does a 31 day starting course. Helps with the foundations a bit. He just seems like a really happy and genuine person. Actually all the instructors do. Only downfall would be, they let you listen to one or two free sets of some courses then you need to pay to unlock the rest. Which I understand the point is to make money. There are plenty of free course. I have used over 6000 minutes of free courses.highly recommend.

I really like the meditations, but what really annoys me is that sometimes some meditations appear in my 'continue listening' section when I haven't even played them and there's no way to clear them from that section. I would really appreciate it if you fixed this issue. Thank you. Edit: it's the second time the app has deleted 'my playlist' (my saved meditations). It's so annoying. Please consider fixing these issues.

I've only just started yesterday. But I've used meditations occasionally in the past. The variety of options for what you're looking for is amazing, and the tutorial like Playlist is fantastic for learning the habits you need for all your meditations. I already feel 10x more relaxed and focused. I tried a sleep meditation last night that made me able to fall asleep in 5-10 minutes after instead of the usual 30+ minutes it usually takes me to fall asleep.

I have tried several meditation apps and I like this one the best thanks to the variety of "teachers" who all have different areas of expertise. On the downside, I have always been happy to pay for apps when they are worth the money but I think the price for the yearly subscription is too high compared to other similar apps.

the main page takes forever to load (if it loads at all) and the app keeps crashin almost all the time, and then gets stuck in a cycle where I can't re open it bc it crashes again sessions keep crashing/going back to main page in the middle of listening to a meditation, or don't even load from the beginning. Instead of working on bugs they just add more. Wouldn't recommend. Updated 2020, still no changes

title: Find Friends, Meet New People, Cuddle Voice Chat
description:
Cuddle like HouseParty and ClubHouse -Free Group Voice Chat Room App ❤️: Random Live Chat with Strangers; Seek, Date & Find Friends; Sing, Karaoke & Play Music; ASMR Sleep & Join HQ trivia; Grow Fans & Make Money! Have Fun with Friends at the House party Online!

💕Cuddle is NOT a dating app, even though lots of Cuddle users chat with strangers, find friends, participate in online marriage ceremonies, become real couples, and even find their soulmate. 

📻Cuddle is NOT a radio app, even though we have lots of DJs that host live shows, play music and sing every day, all of whom engage and interact with their listeners and earn money!

🗣️Cuddle is NOT a walkie talkie, even though people call in and talk with each other about all kinds of topics while having fun in the community. 

🎙️Cuddle is a group voice chat room app, where people can enjoy anything they want to kill time and to kill boredom.

Join Cuddle, the leading group voice chat and house party app with over 100k+ Cuddlers online. Listen to live streams, chat with strangers, and find friends all around the world. Best of all it’s anonymous and free to chat and call. Share your thoughts, play music, join trivia, find someone to match with and love, connect to people, find friends, host games, and earn money. Everything is available 24/7. It’s more fun than walkie talkies and radio. An audio version of House party, Twitch and an interactive version of Discord! No matter where you are, you’ll never be lonely again.

What do Cuddlers love about Cuddle?
🆓Join a free random chat room, where you can send messages/emojis, call in to talk and interact directly with a DJ, and send them virtual gifts to show your love and appreciation.
🎖️Climb the leaderboards, with daily, weekly, and monthly DJ/Fan rankings, and you’ll turn into a famous superstar in Cuddle.
🏆Participate in different events to win avatars, badges, and entrance effects, which will all be sent directly to your in-app bag.
👩🏻‍🎤Follow your favorite DJ. Stay connected through direct messages or whisper (private message) your secrets in live rooms.
💞Select single-host live show, multi-host chat room, Dating Game Theme, or password-protected Private Rooms, to just talk to random strangers, find friends, play dating games to find your romantic date and meetup.
🎮Choose topics such as Social Dating, Just Chatting, Relationships, Music, Comedy, Movies/TV, Anime, ASMR/Sleep, Video Game, Horoscope/Astrology, Trivia Games, and Just Talk.
💃🏻Add voice labels to your favorite DJ: Sexy, Cute, Romantic, Friendly, Sweet, Funny, Warm 
🤼‍♀️DJs can invite other DJs to BATTLE using 1V1 PK function.

Why do Cuddlers love Cuddle?
🎧Listen, Chat, and Find Friends
- Are you bored? Listen to hundreds of casual, and friendly group chats with topics ranging from Music, Singing, karaoke, Love, Games, Relationships, Friends, ASMR, Horoscope, Trivia.
- Don’t feel like putting on makeup? It doesn’t matter. We’re different from Caffeine, Bigo Live, Live.me or Periscope, because you can meet new friends without showing your face. Enjoy a live, real, fun, easy, and safe chat.
- Feeling lonely? We have an active community and social club, and tons of talented, singers, Anime and Manga lovers, gamers, comedians.
- Having trouble falling asleep? Cuddle has many sleep casts to help relax you before you go to bed.

🎙️Broadcast, Live and Start the House party
- Launch a chat room with one click. It’s free to use! Broadcast using your voice to connect with audiences. 
- Can you sing? Perform karaoke, or even do a duet with other users. Love music? Play your own music. Remember to interact with your live audience during the house party.
- Share your life, gain fans, receive gifts, and live in the moment!

No matter where you are, with Cuddle, you’ll never be lonely! Enjoy the new era of radio and walkie talkie! Download Cuddle and have fun with new friends at the house party online together!

title: Remedies for Anxiety
description:
Anxiety is a worldwide problem that in some cases can be resolved with treatment. It's absolutely normal to feel anxious from time to time such as when you have a performance on stage or have an interview.

In such cases as these, a natural treatment for anxiety can provide you relief from anxiety symptoms and help to keep your calmer. Many people turn to smoking, drinking and even harmful drugs to achieve calmness when natural remedies are quite capable to safely give the same effect.

Some of these natural remedies include:

Getting a body workout! Not just exercise; a different routine like getting a massage like shiatsu or Swedish massage. There are different types of massage styles, some greater in intensity than others. Try one or two and see which one suits you best.

Aromatherapy! If you've a wife or girlfriend that loves smelling good she has probably taking a good aroma therapeutic bath. Pleasant smelling oils can be used in setting a bath or in massage therapy. These oils have a an uplifting effect and can also get rid or migraines and headaches. Some of these oils that have been deemed favorite by Americans have been jasmine and lavender flavors.

Some natural treatments and remedies for anxiety include adaptogenics. These herbs help the body withstand stress and fatigue. These two factors are huge instigators of anxiety. By minimizing stress and fatigue, you are less likely to feel overwhelm and keep calmer under challenging situations.

One major benefit of these herbal remedies over other kinds of remedies is that they benefit your overall health, not just relieve you from anxiety. And unlike smoking and drinking, there are no dangerous addiction issues to contend with

Download the app For herbal anxiety remedies that keep you calm and cool under pressure and relieves sweaty palms, palpitations and other symptoms,

title: Fear Buster: Deep Relaxation and Stress Relief
description:
Create Calm. Feel Relief. Enjoy Inner Peace.

Fear Buster is more than a way to relax and create calm -- it's your personal guide to breaking free from your stress and fear so you can move forwards with hope and confidence. Its unique format gives you the freedom to set your own pace and choose the tools that work for you:

Fear Buster First Aid

Here, fast first aid tools for people on the go give you urgent relief from your stress, fear and anxieties, enabling you to relax, think clearer and respond more calmly and quickly in stressful times.  Each tool is unique, giving you the freedom to choose what works best for you, from mindful breathing, to soulful grounding, to the powerful and effective Havening Techniques and more.

Fear Buster Changing Room

These 10 minute techniques give you deeper relief from your stress, anxieties and fears – helping you to build hope and confidence moving forwards.  This is the opportunity to dive deeper into your issues and truly begin to change from fear to calm.

Specific topics include How to:

           ● Change fear for the health and wellbeing of myself and those I love into hope and calm.
           ● Release fear for the future and embrace the unknown with confidence.
           ● Release the fear of failing my children - how to release my secret fear of failing as a parent and forgive yourself for your mistakes.
           ● Adapt to change with ease - learn to adapt to change with resilience and hope. 
           ● Stop being affected by other people's issues – how to keep your center when those around you are freaking out.
           ● Release the fear of failing my exams - how to improve your results by improving your performance abilities.
           ● Changing my dreams for a great sleep -- releasing anxious thoughts and fears while drifting down the gentle River of Dreams.
   
No subscriptions -- just great tools to change your life now.

title: Stress Control Norbu - game, breathing, meditation
description:
Norbu Stress Control is the first app that teaches the user to manage stress and emotions consciously, and trains the adaptive skills.

A difficult situation is such that only an active position helps one stay calm and confident, quickly adapt to the new circumstances and not feel broken inside. However, stress reduction apps generally use relaxing melodies and soothing meditations. Unfortunately, this technique of passive adaptation has only a short-term effect. It rarely helps us counter the challenges of daily life.

🏆 The Norbu team of doctors, specialists in yoga and meditation, and developers has developed the Mindfulness Based Stress Control (MBSC) technique. Over the course of a month, it helps you to become calmer and more confident as well as to develop the skill of active stress management. It's the best choice for anyone who's interested in self-development, mental wellness, breathing and meditation.

✨  Norbu app has two types of training - Quick Help and Challenge to develop stress tolerance. With easy instructions and voice guidance, Norbu's guide will tell you how to do the exercises.

Norbu app has trainings with easy instructions and voice guidance. Norbu's guide will tell you how to do the exercises.

The exercises are very simple. They consist of stress relief games, classical breathing exercises and meditation time. Anyone can do it. You can meditate and breathe with a guide or in silence.

🔥  The anti-stress exercises from Quick Help will help reduce anxious emotions in 2-4 minutes with relaxing games and breathing. They can be used in situations of anxious waiting, after quarrels or provocations in communication, and in sudden unpleasant situations. Quick Help also offers sleep meditation for those who have difficulty falling asleep. For each situation, Norbu has a suitable type of training.

🔥. Self-development is the purpose of the antistress Challenge. During the course of a month, you'll learn to manage stress more effectively. Simply perform a few small exercises - calming games, breathing and guided meditation - once or twice each day for 8-10 minutes. With regular exercise, after just a few days you'll start to better understand and manage your emotions. So, you'll feel more confident and calm in stressful situations. In the following days, these skills will be developed and strengthened.

Regular training can support you in cases of emotional burnout and chronic fatigue syndrome. It will help maintain your immunity despite prolonged stress, and you'll be able to cope with the feelings of insecurity and anxiety.

In the free version you can use basic exercises. The Premium version has exercises and challenges to develop your stress resistance in specific situations that occur in everyday life.

title: Lmtls for Stress & Anxiety
description:
Lmtls takes the user into a tracking cycle, with a focus on tracking thoughts, emotions and behaviours. But Lmtls is more than a mindfulness app – its smart features identify and suggest core beliefs based on tracking details just like your therapist would. Core beliefs contribute to knowledge about the underlying sources of the way we function in the world. Lmtls is specifically patterned after a CBT based protocol and acts as a cognitive diary.

A psychometric cognitive diary that allows users observe their daily tracks in chart form; providing a snapshot of the trajectory of their life or therapeutic interventions. These can be shared with therapists, used to inform future therapy exercise plans, mood management or other life enhancing interventions.

Sometimes a therapist in our pocket would be helpful, and while we can’t shrink one for you, we do provide helpful input, in the form of education, perspective-changers, discussions and its on-demand coaching available when its needed most.

title: iPrevail: Anxiety & Depression
description:
Feeling stressed or anxious and need to vent? Going through feelings of depression and need counseling support? 

Download iPrevail and connect now for free with someone who has faced challenges of their own and will listen to you. Browse and select a Trained Peer who will give you kind and respectful support. This is a no judgement community.  

Learn mindfulness strategies to help with stress, anxiety, relationships, depression, or simply vent privately to your own Trained Peer Specialist who has been through clinically-proven treatment & training.   

Now, no matter if you are sitting in bed, taking a break from your busy workday, out and about, or just can't sleep - you are able to privately reach someone who cares and is there for you. Access free online counseling and therapy wherever you are.  

Join the thousands that have already started feeling better in our community. Your helpful, on-demand support is finally here. We are looking forward to you joining us. Download and connect now for free.

Ive had to make 3 accounts already because it keeps telling me my password is wrong (when i know it isnt) and when i click forgot password it says it sends me an email but it doesnt (i even checked my spam) its really too bad this app doesnt work :( hopefully its fixed as it is affordable.

Best overall app ive found on Play Store. It was designed to be as helpful to those using the app as possible. Life changing tools that are easy to get some understanding in the 30-40 minutes a day, or maybe 2 weeks. And it's important enough to the developers that somehow they manage to pay between 60-90 dollars to anyone that puts a little effort to finish the lessons. Amazon gift cards are incentive even for those not needing of CBT . Appreciat the people involved, and blessed they care so

maybe it would work for others, and it really did help me, that is until i met one peer that flagged me as innapropriate for no reason, and now i cant talk to anyone which literally made me more depressed than when i started. maybe making a system to check if the peer is flagging for a good reason instead of just shutting us out would make me like this better... this is me giving up and signing off, i'd rather deal with my depression alone if i have to jump through hoops to talk to someone

title: feel better - Mood & CBT therapy to manifest goals
description:
Depression is on the rise and will soon kill more people than heart disease. Social media, email, messaging, apps, and now intelligent bots fight for our attention and feed addictions. Meditate? Turn our phones off? How? A super active mind takes great pleasure getting things done and technology is our productivity tool. While actually, we often *lose focus* through the overwhelm technology brings us. Information overload, stress, lack of sleep, anxiety or sadness creeps in. Creativity takes a hit. Prioritization becomes challenging. Rather than fueling our own burn out, we need to feel better, quickly.

This app won’t solve your problems. You will. With feelbetter, you focus on what’s important, you shift your state of mind, and you inspire yourself RIGHT NOW. Recalibrate every day, or every meal: Prioritize and act on what truly matters over and over. In five minutes, feel better’s guided session is the shortest path for us to inspire ourselves. It applies principles found in CBT, goal setting, vision boards, biofeedback, growth mindset exercises, law of abundance, manifestation, journaling, and personal development coaching. FAST. Have time to process others’ inspiration? feel better’s video section goes deeper into your interests, be it financial growth, meditation, lucid dreaming, breath work, love, co-living, sleep hypnosis, learning from innovation and thought leaders, or just plain old awesome people doing awesome things.

Features
○ feel better guided path
○ Goal setting and daily goals
○ Focus reminders
○ Mood tracking diary 
○ Gratitude chat
○ Intelligent mood prediction messaging
○ Emotional patterns  
○ Inspirational videos
○ 1-click mood recording
○ Anonymous guest mode  

Benefits
○ Manifest your goals
○ Listen to your intuition  
○ Trust yourself 
○ Reduce stress, anxiety, and sadness
○ Know your dreams
○ Know your priorities
○ Ask better questions
○ Make constant progress
○ Sleep better
○ Stay inspired

This app won’t tell you what to do. You will. With feelbetter, you ask better questions, you become confident in what you want most, and want to do RIGHT NOW. Check your moods’ compass every day or every meal: Prioritize and act on what truly matters over and over. It’s not over- or under-achieving, instead you are achieving what matters. Feel better now, and with access to your history, see the results with your own eyes. 

feelbetterapp.io

title: Fight Depression Naturally
description:
This app is designed by medical doctors to help with Depression treatment and controlling stress by advising mood enhancing foods, teaching the importance of writing wellness journals and how to get adequate sleep during depressive episodes.

Chosen as one among the Top 10 apps for Depression by Healthline

The scientific information provided in this app are updated with the current research articles published in standard Journals of Psychiatry, to the best of our knowledge.

♥ 20 Super foods that removes depressing thoughts and anxiety
A beautiful description of the foods items that can enhance your mood and release feel-good chemicals which will make you happy in no time. The scientific explanations of how each food will elevate your mood are also included in a simple way.

♥ 8 Techniques to help with your Depression treatment
Learn the simple tricks of getting adequate sleep to writing a wellness checklist and journal, which will brighten up your day and prevent the occurrence of depressive episodes. Each techniques are explained in detail with a step by step action plan.

♥ Essential book of Inspirational Songs
The right inspiring lyrics can give you a kick in the backside and provides a quick 'pick me up' to motivate you to accomplish your goals.

♥Over 100 hours of Relaxing Nature Sounds and Meditation Songs with Videos to fight depression

♥10 hours of Binaural beats to help you concentrate easily
 
♥ Yoga techniques that can help in your depression treatment

♥ How to Use Breath Watching Meditation for anxiety relief

♥ The Big Book of Inspiring Stories

♥ Motivational Movie Archive for controlling Stress

♥ The Vault of Inspirational Quotes

♥ Poems That Inspire

All the contents used in this app are non copyrighted or under CCO license.

Please read the medical disclaimer in the Info section of the app before you start using it.
This application uses Google Analytics to anonymously track usage data within the application.

title: Happy being - stress relief, improve wellbeing
description:
Personalized guidance to enhance wellbeing, manage stress & anxiety better, create stronger relations, boost focus & decision making. Heal from past pain, overcome blocks, and get aware, manage, and express your feelings better.

Featured 
+ App of the day. +
+ Award-winning #1 wellbeing app, +
+ Among Global Top 5 Apps for meditation +
+ Among Global top 5 App for mental health and emotional wellbeing App +

Wellbeing is a state in which you feel healthy, happy, and successful.
It includes achieving your true potential, coping effectively with day-to-day stress and challenges, having meaningful relationships, and living to your full potential.

Wellbeing affects one's state of health, thoughts, and actions. This impacts your relationships, focus, personal harmony, and decision making.

Often a lack in one, without one's awareness, can negatively impact other areas, showing up as more dissatisfaction, discord, poor performance, health issues, and distress, affecting your quality of life.

With just 10-15 mins a day, our happiness bots help you enhance and take self-care of your wellbeing in 3 simple steps.

STEP 1: Get instantly, your wellbeing measured across 8 pillars of your life. 

STEP 2: Get personalized actions, priorities, and tools that work best for you to enhance your wellbeing. 

STEP 3: Get personalized workouts and guidance every day, by our happiness bots (powered by AI), ensuring your privacy, supporting anywhere, anytime. Choose from 800+ tools that work best for you. 

FEATURES:
+ My Goals: The first step to improving your wellbeing is to help you understand - what are your aspirations, approaches, and priorities. Measure your wellbeing, set goals, and achieve growth across 8 pillars of your life:

title: How to Overcome Anxiety Attack
description:
If you want to know how to overcome anxiety, you must be quick to notice what wrong with you and what you need to do to correct it.

It is wise you quickly learn how to overcome anxiety now otherwise you will continue to feel stressed, unhappy and anxious throughout your life. You will suffer unduly because anxiety will weaken you mentally, sap your energy and you will not be at your best.

Of what use is it to you to experience anxiety because you want to meet a date or you have an important job interview? You need to learn how to overcome anxiety without the need to take any medication.

Here are some useful tips to help you overcome anxiety completely:

Learn to put everything you do in the hands of God. Pray until you get assurance that whatever the outcome, it is the best for you.

Practice the art of controlling your thoughts. Learn to convert your negative thoughts into positive ones. Your inability to take complete control of your thoughts fuels anxiety. There are several proven resources that can help you take full control of your thoughts and eventually eliminate anxiety from your life.

Learn to affirm and visualize the good in everything you do or want to do. Visualize a positive outcome from the date or from that job interview. If your expectations are not met, see it as if it is not the best for you.

Fill your mind with activities that will banish anxiety from your day. Get busy in order to keep your mind off anything that can trigger anxiety.
Learn to speak to your problems until they hear and vanish. Unless you speak by faith, you are not speaking in power where your problem will hear and tremble. You have the power to speak and overcome anxiety fast.

Look for reasons to laugh at your anxiety. This will fill your heart with enough power to handle any situation that seems impossible. To overcome anxiety, surround yourself always with cheerful and positive-minded people.

To overcome anxiety and put an end to it completely, I suggest you quickly apply the One Move technique to your situation and Download this app now.

comments: As a mental health clinician I wanted to trial it before recommending. Found the UI delightful, however, unfortunately I think this requires a higher degree of functioning than I'd hoped. Example, holding your breath. no indication when to exhale when being 'teleported' sounds silly I know but some need those correct prompts. Update UI with more information in each area addressing functionality would be well received. Lots of areas didn't work at all such as music, really buggy. Samsung S20

Overall, the app is great. It makes you think about deeper questions in life. One thing that I found problematic, and hence deducted 2 stars is that the app keeps crashing for some reason. I'll be in the middle of writing my journal and it'll crash. Although, the journal entry is usually saved automatically before the crash, it's really frustrating. Please look into this. Other than that, its a really fun and engaging app. Thank you.

This is a wonderful app and I feel lucky to have seen the reddit post by the creator, its a blessing. You can feel the care that went into making it, just the fact it doesn't have ads or ask for money makes it 100X better than any other. But what's really amazing is how much it helps, even when there isn't anything wrong it's incredibly calming, I love the new nature sounds section.
Finally found an app I think I could use daily and really get some good out of but everytime I try to sign up it takes me back to the homepage it's really annoying. Uninstalling
Great app! But has started to glitch, and close and reopen the app. I have a Pixel 4.

title: Resuscitate - Fight Depression & Anxiety Together
description:
With kindness and positivity, we can achieve a better world where people have to suffer just a little less than usual.
Resuscitate tries to cater this ideology with a simple online application.
It is an online detox platform that uses the power of togetherness and positivity to make not just yours, but the life of everyone else just a little better by sharing happiness.

To achieve what we call "Emotional Resuscitation", we gave the platform 4 features:
1.	The Good Vibe Wall
2.	Ocean Of Happiness
3.	Never Alone
4.	Better Positivity

The Good Vibe Wall:

The Good Vibe Wall focuses on the positive side of social media by eliminating the toxic features of the existing ones.
It is based on the principal that happiness multiplies by sharing.
It is a publicly visible feed where random positive posts by fellow users appear; without revealing their identity.
It follows an abstract reaction policy with a single reaction “This made me smile!”; so that one doesn’t judge a post based on the person posting it or the number of reactions.
Which also means and symbolizes that a million dollar celebrity is same as an ordinary teen and that your happiness is independent of your social status.

Ocean of Happiness:

Ocean of happiness is your own bucket of happiness filled with little happy memories from every single day.
It focuses on using optimism to achieve the goals of "Emotional Resuscitation”. 
It is like a personal diary, but to record just the happy things that only you can access at times when life hits you hard,
And to remind you that it’s always you one – life zero.

Never Alone:

Never Alone is a feature that addresses and solves the problem of not being able to express ourselves to even the people closest to us during the hard times.
If The Good Vibe Wall is about boosting happiness by sharing, then Never Alone is about solving problems together.
It is a place where you can ask fellow resuscitators to help you with your life problems. Or on the brightest days, you can be the helper.

Better Positivity:

Better Positivity is a classic news aggregator in a positivity wrapping, thus filtering only the good news across the globe.

title: Guided Mental Health Journal - Iona Mind
description:
86% of users report feeling better after their first session with Iona Mind: the AI journal with empathy.

Many of us suffer from stress, anxiety, low mood, poor sleep or generally feeling disconnected.

That’s why we created Iona Mind: your guide for fitness of the mind. 

Whether you’re seeking support through challenging times or simply seeking personal growth, we’re here, in your pocket, 24/7. 

Iona Mind is something new and different. We aim to help you deal with the causes of problems, not just the symptoms. We use the latest scientifically backed tools from CBT and performance psychology.

HOW WE HELP

😀 Track your mood and identify patterns of thinking and behaviour. 

🔨 Tools and exercises to manage stress, anxiety and low mood. 

🔬 Personalised plans, based on science, to help you achieve your mental fitness goals. 

📝 Daily gratitude journal and guided mental health check-ins.

🧘 Meditation and mindfulness exercises.

😊 Increase emotional awareness and manage difficult feelings.

🗣️ Understand your internal dialogue and make sure it’s working for you.

💭 Insights into common thinking patterns and biases. 

📚 A library of helpful concepts and information drawn from cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT). 

PRIVACY BY DESIGN

🔒 Everything you do in the app is private and confidential. Your data is not shared or sold and can be permanently deleted at any time.

Guided Mental Health Check-ins and Smart Journaling

★ With a smart daily gratitude journal and guided mental health check-ins, you can build habits that improve your mental wellbeing and emotional resilience. 

★ Iona walks you through guided check-ins to help you understand your internal dialogue and make sure it’s serving you. It’s like having a little therapist or coach in your pocket. 

★ Manage difficult feelings by reflecting on your experiences or enhance positive emotions during times of success, happiness or fulfillment. 

Your complete guide to fitness of the mind

- Monitor your moods with smart mood tracking
- Achieve your goals with personalized goal setting
- Get personalized insights into your thoughts and biases
- Understand and learn key concepts from cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT)
- Access a library of psychological exercises 
- Interact with Iona, your self-care companion
- Calm anxiety and boost mood
- Learn about your emotional and mental health
- Reduce stress and improve sleep
- Self-help for challenges, big and small
- Manage stress, anxiety and low mood
- Keep a daily gratitude journal
- Learn calming breathing techniques
- Practice mindfulness and meditation
- Manage difficult feelings through personalized dialogues 
- Understand your self-talk and ensure it’s working for you
- Interact with a conversational artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot
- Build resilience through regular reflections 
- Education about mental health and well-being

From our users:

“This is a really thorough and well rounded app, in my opinion it is good for everyone, whether or not you have anxiety, depression or other issues. It is so important to keep the mind healthy and this app provides many starting points and innovative ideas to help you along the way. With this app it is always your journey and you dictate the speed. I thoroughly enjoy using it and it has become my daily companion” - Ying Li

”Surprisingly helpful! Love this new idea. I like how this app is really clear and guides you by the hand through different exercises. It's not like stuff I've tried before but it's really helped me stop worrying. I like that it's based on CBT. I've had that in the past and it was also useful” - JH

title: Anxiety Attack
description:
How to Deal With Anxiety

Start using these tips to start to take back control if you are experiencing anxiety attacks.

If you frequently suffer from anxiety attacks it is important to talk to your doctor, anxiety attacks can cause serious disruption in your life.

It’s normal to feel a little anxiety from time to time, but a full-blown panic attack can be a really frightening and overwhelming experience. 

Fortunately, there are simple steps you can take during an attack to calm yourself and get the symptoms under control. 

As soon as you feel an anxiety attack coming on, take a moment to ground yourself and breathe deeply. 

To prevent future attacks, work on addressing the underlying cause of your anxiety. 

If you’re having trouble managing your anxiety on your own, a doctor or therapist can help.

Anxiety can be experienced occasionally or as a persistent condition that can interfere with your life. 

It’s natural to feel stressed before a big event or during a busy period. 

If you notice yourself experiencing anxiety for long periods of time, however, and you can’t seem to kick it, a closer examination of this may be beneficial. 

If you’re concerned about your anxiety, it’s important to talk to a therapist, psychologist, or psychiatrist about your experiences.

title: Mental Health Tracker: Mental Disorders Test
description:
Note: The content in this app were made in the light of psycom.net (a mental health platform). The whole app is intended for fun and education purposes. For serious treatment plans and diagnosis, one should always go to a professional doctor or psychologist.

In this app, you will find useful testing information regarding some of the most common mental disorders. Mental health is extremely important in one's life. You will be asked questions regarding specific mental health issues and at the end get a result. According to the result, you will also be getting recommendations regarding treatment. Get fruitful testing and treatment information regarding the following mental health and personality disorders:

1) Depression: Depression is a state of low mood and aversion to activity. It can affect a person's thoughts, behavior, motivation, feelings, and sense of well-being. It may feature sadness, difficulty in thinking and concentration and a significant increase or decrease in appetite and time spent sleeping. People experiencing depression may have feelings of dejection, hopelessness and, sometimes, suicidal thoughts. It can either be short term or long term. The core symptom of depression is said to be anhedonia, which refers to loss of interest or a loss of feeling of pleasure in certain activities that usually bring joy to people. Depressed mood is a symptom of some mood disorders such as major depressive disorder or dysthymia.

2) Sociopathy: Antisocial personality disorder (ASPD or APD) is a personality disorder characterized by a long-term pattern of disregard for, or violation of, the rights of others. A low moral sense or conscience is often apparent, as well as a history of crime, legal problems, or impulsive and aggressive behavior.

3) ADHD: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a neurodevelopmental disorder characterized by difficulty paying attention, or excessive activity and acting without regards to consequences, which are otherwise not appropriate for a person's age. Some individuals with ADHD also display difficulty regulating emotions or problems with executive function.

4) Bipolar Disorder: Bipolar disorder, previously known as manic depression, is a mental disorder characterized by periods of depression and abnormally elevated moods. If the elevated mood is severe or associated with psychosis, it is called mania; if it is less severe, it is called hypomania. During mania, an individual behaves or feels abnormally energetic, happy, or irritable. Individuals often make impulsive decisions with little regard for the consequences. There is usually a reduced need for sleep during manic phases. During periods of depression, individuals may experience crying, a negative outlook on life, and poor eye contact with others.

5) Schizophrenia: Schizophrenia is a mental illness characterized by continuous or relapsing episodes of psychosis. Major symptoms include hallucinations (often hearing voices), delusions, and disorganized thinking. Other symptoms include social withdrawal, decreased emotional expression, and apathy. Symptoms typically come on gradually, begin in young adulthood, and in many cases never resolve. There is no objective diagnostic test; diagnosis is based on observed behavior, a history that includes the person's reported experiences, and reports of others familiar with the person.

6) Anxiety: Anxiety disorders are a group of mental disorders characterized by significant feelings of anxiety and fear. Anxiety is a worry about future events, while fear is a reaction to current events. These feelings may cause physical symptoms, such as increased heart rate and shakiness. There are several anxiety disorders, including generalized anxiety disorder, specific phobia, social anxiety disorder, separation anxiety disorder, agoraphobia, panic disorder, and selective mutism. The disorder differs by what results in the symptoms. An individual may have more than one anxiety disorder.

Enjoy!

title: Techniques relaxation against anxiety
description:
The relaxation of mind and body is very important to keep us in harmony and peace.
Application relaxation techniques helps users to control their breathing, which directly influence the reduction of hyperventilation, chills, heartbeat, tension, stress, anxiety and panic attack.
Physical and mental relaxation is intimately related to the individual's joy, calmness and personal well-being.
With this application of relaxation techniques to eliminate stress you will have the best routines to get that deep relaxation we need. Daily stress tenses us too much, with this application of deep relaxation techniques you can relax and enjoy for a few moments the tranquility of relaxing music and park your worries leaving your mind blank and your body relaxed.
The benefits that we will obtain when putting relaxation techniques in our lives are the following:
- They make our self-esteem improve.
- They help us fall asleep.
- Reduce the levels of cortisol (the stress hormone) in our blood.
- They lead us to a feeling of well-being.
The best times to perform these relaxation techniques are right after waking up or before going to sleep. Below we show you some of the relaxation techniques you can use every day, making them part of your routine against anxiety or stress:
- Perform breathing with the diaphragm
- Perform meditation
- Direct the imagination towards an imagined scenario that transmits peace and calmness.
- Jacobson's progressive muscle relaxation
About 10 minutes of these techniques of daily relaxation of deep breathing, can help you to generate a state of calm and peace all day.
So download this free application with the best music, techniques and relaxation and breathing exercises to maintain a healthy balance, and combat anxiety and stress.

title: BrainwaveX Anxiety
description:
BrainwaveX Anxiety is a powerful brainwave therapy to reduce Anxiety.

Anxiety is an emotion characterized by an unpleasant state of inner turmoil, often accompanied by nervous behavior, such as pacing back and forth, somatic complaints and rumination. It is the subjectively unpleasant feelings of dread over anticipated events, such as the feeling of imminent death.

Research shows that Anxiety have reduced gray matter and activity in the hippocampus, midbrain, thalamus, insula, superior temporal gyrus,  temporal poles anterior cingulate, posterior cingulate and left lateral orbitofrontal cortex.
White matter reductions are found in the left medial and the superior frontal gyrus.

BrainwaveX Anxiety consist of 3 different sessions.    
Each session is 3:30 minutes.

All sessions are crucial to have a complete treatment!

Get ready for a total natural healing.

Enjoy your explorations.

http://www.brainwavex.com

title: How to Overcome Anxiety
description:
How To Overcome Fear And Anxiety | What makes you anxious?

Because anxiety is a type of fear, the things we’ve described about fear above are also true for anxiety.

The word ‘anxiety’ tends to be used to describe worry, or when fear is nagging and persists over time. It is used when the fear is about something in the future rather than what is happening right now.

Anxiety is a word often used by health professionals when they’re describing persistent fear. The ways that you feel when you’re frightened and anxious are very similar, as the basic emotion is the same.

What do fear and anxiety feel like?
When you feel frightened or seriously anxious, your mind and body work very quickly. These are some of the things that might happen:

Your heart beats very fast – maybe it feels irregular
You breathe very fast
Your muscles feel weak
You sweat a lot
Your stomach churns or your bowels feel loose
You find it hard to concentrate on anything else
You feel dizzy
You feel frozen to the spot
You can’t eat
You have hot and cold sweats
You get a dry mouth
You get very tense muscles

These things occur because your body, sensing fear, is preparing you for an emergency, so it makes your blood flow to the muscles, increases blood sugar, and gives you the mental ability to focus on the thing that your body perceives as a threat.

Download this Android App To Overcome Fear And Anxiety..

title: Be Mentally Healthy (Stress and Anxiety Therapy)
description:
Are you struggling with depression or anxiety? 
Do you often feel low and ‘hopeless’? 

This simple app could help you on your journey to recovering your mental health. 
Everyday, for the next three months, it has a daily tip or task, which should inspire you to get your life back on track. These mental health suggestions are centred around positivity and well-being therapy, but taking a 'small steps' approach so that they are achievable. 

By having a go at a mental health task each day, the aim is that you take more time to appreciate life, which will help on the road to recovery.
Keep a record of your achievements by updating its journal as a reminder of your mental health journey.
This app is designed to support those struggling with such mental health conditions as negativity, stress, anxiety and depression. This is not about quick-fixes or false promises. This is about real progress, a day at a time.

Check out the trailer at: https://youtu.be/TngFFVhlQfw

This is great value and is the full product - there are No Ads or In-App-Purchases in this app.

title: Calming Anxiety Relief
description:
Calming Anxiety Relief app has two sections:
1. A deep breathing Exercise
2. Calming quotes section

1.Relaxing breathing exercise is a deep breathing and relaxation tool. It enables you to pace your breathing cycle to adjustable settings.

Relaxing breathing exercise includes:

* adjustable duration settings for inhale, in hold, exhale, out hold
* adjustable overall duration
* your breath is guided by an animated bar
* 20 different affirmations to read as you inhale and exhale
* choose from 6 different background images
* 4 audio options ( Relaxation Music / Stream Sounds / Waterfall Sounds / Silent )  


Deep breathing has many benefits including:
* reduced stress
* nervous system is calmer
* immune system has more energy
* improved circulation

Experiment with different settings to find a comfortable breathing exercise tailored to your own personal needs.

Breathing Sessions can be used to calm anxiety and reduce tension.

2. Quotes section Includes:

* 70 calming quotes from famous people for example Oscar Wilde, Charlie Chaplin, Albert Einstein and many more
* 10 different background images.

As an example of the type of quotes below find the first three:

"Nothing is permanent in this wicked world – not even our troubles." Charlie Chaplin

"Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are." Chinese Proverb

"Worrying does not take away tomorrow's Troubles it takes away today's Peace." Unknown

title: Reduce Stress & Anxiety Relief
description:
Completely release all stress and tension, so that you feel refreshed and revitalised on every level. Regular use of this app can help you:

* calm your anxieties 
* reduce your panic attacks
* deal better with confrontations
* control your stress levels
* better manage everyday tension
* sleep more peacefully at night

Our life enhancing technology was built thanks to awards granted to ZenZone by the UK Government (via the London Development Agency) and the European Commission (via the European Regional Development Fund).

title: Think Anxiety-free! Hypnosis
description:
***The Audio files are high quality and therefore quite large, a good wifi Connection is necessary to download***If you face any issue with your Android application, please do write to our support email address before rating the application ***

THINK ANXIETY-FREE! AFFIRMATIONS FOR ANXIETY AND FEAR

Would you like to be free of your fears and anxieties once and for all? Would you like to feel that you have regained your quality of life? Would you like to let go of your anxiety about the past and your fear of the future and of your life? This affirmation program can support you in alleviating or even completely dispelling your fears and anxieties through numerous positive, motivational statements. Use positive affirmations and learn to give up your existing avoidance strategies in order to feel free and lighthearted once again and regain trust in yourself so that you can handle any situation with confidence.

WHAT EXACTLY ARE AFFIRMATIONS?

Affirmations are an easy and effective self-coaching technique that is particularly optimal for supporting processes of change in your life. An affirmation is nothing other than a short, positively formulated sentence (of faith) or positive belief, and the secret to its success lies in repetition.

Because our thoughts, feelings and actions form an interdependent relationship, we can influence our feelings and behavior by changing our thoughts. Hence, with the help of affirmations, negative, unconscious thoughts and self-doubt can be changed for the better.

HOW AND WHEN SHOULD I USE THE PROGRAM?

The secret to the success of affirmations lies in repetition. With approximately 20 minutes a day, you will quickly feel and experience your first successes. Kim Fleckenstein recommends that the program be used daily over a period of four weeks or longer.

ABOUT KIM FLECKENSTEIN

„Think Healthy!“ was designed by well-known German Hypnotherapist Kim Fleckenstein. Kim Fleckenstein is a certified alternative practitioner in psychotherapy, a clinical Hypnotherapist and NLP-Master-Coach. Based in Munich she already published a range of best-selling self-help and hypnosis programs as Apps and MP3s under the label GET ON APPS!. Her unique technique and self experiences have helped to create the special character and heart of her recordings. 

Together with professional and native speaker Cathy Weber she also publishes her programs in English.

WHAT YOU GET

* A highly effective 24-Minute professional Affirmation session using the latest relaxation techniques – suitable for both, beginners and more experienced users.
* The professional and warm voice of Cathy Weber, which leads you into a deep state of relaxation and change.
* A high quality and state of the art recording.
* Professionally composed background music for every program by CSW Music.
* Customize your settings and discover other useful features.

PLEASE NOTE

Please do not listen to this program while driving or during activities that require your full attention. The program does not replace consultation with a doctor or any medications which may be required to treat an illness.

Hypnosis is basically suitable for all physically and mentally healthy people. If you are undergoing therapeutic treatment, e.g., for depression or psychosis, and/or taking any prescription medications, please consult with your physician before using this program. The program does not replace any treatment for pathological anxiety disorders.

Kim Fleckenstein makes no representation of her program with regard to healing. The user assumes full responsibility for the application of the program.

The optimal effect can be obtained by listening to the program once a day over a period of at least 30 days.

title: De-StressMe: CBT Tools to Manage Stress
description:
De-StressMe brings personalized Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care tools to your phone. Now you can manage stress, get stress relief, and improve mental health with the click of a button. And it's free!

De-StressMe has 3 primary features: 

1) Education about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care. Every day for 31 days at a time you choose, you will receive a brief, 10 second lesson. Each lesson is designed to be quick and easy to understand allowing you to reflect on the lesson the rest of the day. These lessons also teach you how to use the app more effectively.

2) Stress management and preparation for future stressful situations. You can set self-care goals, reflect on personal strengths, count the positives in your life, write about your day in a Mood Diary, and create coping cards to keep yourself centered and balanced. 

3) Stress relief when you need it most. Just click the De-StressMe button and the statements you wrote to manage stress and the questions you answered in the tutorial get transformed and used for relaxation, stress relief, and improved mental health.

Free features include:
• Personalized Cognitive Behavioral Therapy tools to manage stress. Includes over 12 different CBT techniques to center you when you need it most such as distress scales, credit lists, deep breathing and relaxation, imagery techniques, self-care goals, and more.
• 31 high-impact, ten second lessons for learning self-care, coping skills, relaxation techniques, and CBT theories.
• Sections for writing self-care ideas, things you are thankful for, personal strengths and coping cards to keep you centered. These entries are also used to improve the de-stressing tool’s effectiveness to maximize stress relief.
• A mood diary for journaling about your day and mood.
• Reminders to attend to self-care, social supports, and emotional wellness.
• Password entry for your diary with a back-up security question to keep your information secure from prying eyes.
• Suicide hotline number for calling and texting at high stress levels.
• All of your information stays on your phone. De-StressMe does not take data from your phone.
• And most importantly, no Ads! So nothing interferes with you getting your stress relief when you need it. 

For a limited time, premium features included free: 
• 10+ bonus 10 second lessons based on Acceptance Commitment Therapy.
• Over 35 pre-filled coping cards to help you cope with difficult situations such as problems at work, keeping boundaries around toxic people, and difficult changes in life.
• Over 100 self-care ideas based on embracing your creativity, relaxing, being active, and being social.
• Over 100 statements for giving thanks ranging from simple things to grandiose statements about life and success.
• Over 100 individual strength ideas, inherent and physical strengths.
• The ability to favorite and edit these coping cards, self-care ideas, personal strengths, and affirmations of thanks. This dramatically cuts down on the time you spend typing.

Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) has been found to be one of the most effective therapies to manage stress, strengthen coping skills, and improve mental health in a myriad of medical and psychological studies. However, therapy is expensive and there are often few options for good therapists in many parts of the world. De-StressMe makes therapy skills available to everyone. 

Your feedback is great for helping us achieve our goal of helping the most people. Please rate, comment, and share.

This app should not be used to replace therapy or medication for people with untreated or uncontrolled mental illness. It is not a medical treatment.

De-StressMe provides simple Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care tools for managing stress, stress relief, and improving mental health.

https://www.facebook.com/DeStressM3/

recentChanges: Badges section updated.
comments: This has been a great app, it's especially useful when you're having an anxiety attack and you can't help yourself or have anyone to go to. Even if things escalate (suicidal ideation, self-harm etc) it still provides help and resources.

I have a VERY HIGH stress level.This app helps with calming my anxiety,looking at things in a more positive light,and is just THE BEST all around app that is FREE and HELPFUL.TRY IT-you'll love it,too!!!

De-stress Me is a mental well-being app based on cognitive-behavioral (CBT) techniques. I am currently a graduate student in psychology, and as such, I used this app with a discerning eye. The first time I opened the app I was greeted by a rather minimal interface with several options on the bottom of the screen, and a big de-stressMe button in the center. The options along the bottom allow you to input information including your strengths, ways to give thanks, and self-care ideas. The information that you input is used when you activate the de-stressing tool. One of the primary components of CBT is cognitive restructuring which entails challenging negative and automatic thoughts. The app cleverly integrates the information that you input into the bottom menus in order to assist you in challenging negatively oriented thoughts that you may experience during times of stress. Additionally, the app may suggest a technique that I am familiar with from my training, diaphragmatic breathing. The app does a good job of teaching and applying the basic tenants of both strategies. Overall, the app was helpful in reducing my stress and is based on sound psychological principles. I would recommend this app to anyone looking for a convenient and cost-effective way to reduce stress in their life.
Lovely, well designed and effective app. A must for those prone to stress and anxiety. Particularly love the images of progressing up a mountain in de-stress mode.
This app is really helping me! It seems simple but is highly effective the more a person practices with it. I'm glad this app is available and is free!

title: The Relaxing Tree - an app for fast stress relief
description:
Add the Relaxing Tree as part of your guided meditations to quieten your mind and help you sleep or unwind.

Take a break and unwind as this app can help you de-stress and take back control of your mind.

Just sit comfortably, start the app and begin a restful 2-minute journey to inner calm.

Mental health experts and sleep professionals agree that meditation and deep breathing can ease stress, aid sleep and help you to manage panic attacks.

Improve general health and well-being by slowing your breathing with this guided meditation.

Unlike other breathing apps, our breathing app displays a beautifully animated tree which will grow and flourish as you breathe. It helps you to avoid mental distraction and experience mindful meditation more easily.

The combination of meditation sounds with images of nature has a powerful ability to relax and calm the mind.

FEATURES:
• Simple meditation - takes just 2 minutes
• Can be used totally offline
• No subscription
• Meditate anytime, anywhere
• Mindfulness made simple
• Helps you focus on something else instead of panic or anxiety
• Perfect for busy people
• Use before bedtime to promote deep sleep

If you suffer from anxiety and stress, try this simple breathing exercise. It's proven that wellness apps, breathing techniques, physical exercises and a good diet can help to improve mental health. Use on your own, as a couple or with a friend or partner.

Deep breathing and mindful concentration can distract negative thinking and start to ease some of the symptoms of anxiety and mental health disorders.

People who are better at controlling stress in their lives generally experience more restful sleep, better relationships and happier lives.

This beautifully simple 2-minute meditation will help you to calm your mind, achieve healthy restfulness and promote inner happiness. Beautiful and simple graphics with relaxing sounds. Elegant design and one of the easiest to navigate breathing apps.

Incorporate 2 minutes of mindful breathing into your daily routine and experience the difference.

Download this app for free and experience the magic of The Relaxing Tree.

title: Anxiety Audios
description:
Taking care of our anxiety levels is more important today then any other time.

You may already know that by having a higher level than normal of anxiety decreases our immune system and increases our susceptibility to health issues from the very common problems all the way up to serious infections.


Our bodies use two protection systems - the Immune system for our insides and the adrenal system also called Fight or flight for outside threats.

The adrenal system is what the body uses to take vital energy and blood supply from the rest of the body to the heart, lungs, arms and legs to either fight or run from danger.

The adrenal system is also what kicks in when we are Anxious.

We perceive a threat and our bodies cant tell the difference between being attacked by a Wild Animal and the anxiety of something like getting on a plane, facing a day at work or something similar.


The problem is that long periods of Anxiety can take energy and blood-flow away from the immune system when it needs it most.

Fighting anxiety is as important as physical health as they go hand in hand.


How does it work?


Hypnotherapy guides your conscious mind to stop momentarily, just like when you zone out whilst driving or reading but still obtain control.

Whilst in this state our subconscious mind is literally ready for new positive suggestions.

A ‘hypnotic induction’ is the name of this process.

Your Anxiety Audio uses the same language and information that you would expect to hear during an actual hypnotherapy session but for a fraction of the price and of course to be listened to as often as you like, where ever you like.


The audio is 16 minutes long.

It begins with a brief simple explanation of how hypnosis works and then continues into an induction (hypnosis process), then Anxiety reducing guidance is given whilst you use your imagination to its fullest.

There is then a wake up process at the end of the audio where you are directed out of the hypnotic state and then open your eyes feeling fresh and reenergised with reduced Anxiety.


Directions of use


1. Do not exercise before

2. Do not drink coffee for up to 3 hours before using.

3. Use the toilet before using.

4. Find a time when you not be disturbed.

5. Turn any devices that could distract you off.

6. Wear loose and comfortable clothing.

7. Sit upright in a comfortable chair with you 2 feet flat on the floor.

8. Hydrate yourself before use.

9. We recommend you listen every day for a minimum of 7 days.

title: Break Free Anxiety
description:
The Break Free app is designed to reduce and eliminate any anxiety, fears or worries that you may have. It will help you take actions to move forward, evaluate and remove your fear. When you have a fear or worry, add it to your worry list.

If you find you anxiety levels increasing then use the breathing link or the free audio that will reduce or eliminate your anxiety (just follow the instructions). Listen to the “Click Track” with headphones, which lasts for less than fifteen minutes and then make a plan of what to do

Use the affirmation section as an opportunity for you to say something positive that you know about yourself in order to help you take an action and overcoming what was troubling you.

title: Appiness stress, anxiety and depression relief
description:
Appiness is the leader community focused on mental wellbeing. We will help you relax your mind, calm down and fight anxiety, stress and depression. 

How Appiness will help you? We are the founders of a new methodology called Personal Debugging created through the combination of current psychology mastery, ancient meditation techniques and new disciplines like computer science. 

Have you ever questioned yourself why self-help, meditation apps and many relaxation techniques don't work as expected? Did you read tons of books about how to "feel better" or meditate and didn't work? Is your anxiety still there after that? Yes, mostly because they don't take into account the most important key of everything: yourself.  

How does it work? Personal Debugging helps you to learn about yourself, who you really are, the real YOU. And knowing yourself is the only driver to understand about your concerns and worries and tackle them in a proper way, only for you and your personality. Everyone is a different being. 

Who we are? Appiness are a group of professional experts in different areas (psychology, meditation and computer science) and a community of users that share the same concerns and walked the same way you are now. We focus on helping each other and mastering Personal Debugging. We will help you understand the cause of your concerns and adapt properly. 

In what areas can Personal Debugging help you?

* Learning about your personality traits and how they affect your life.
* Manage anxiety
* Fight common disorders such as stress or depression
* Sleep better
* Learn to relax and meditate.
* Mindfulness techniques.
* Improve your self-esteem
* Calm and relax and understanding the reasons sometimes you cannot easily achieve it

Appiness offers you:

* Discover your type of personality based on one of the 16 personality types and what are your traits.
* Track your stress, anxiety and depression levels.
* Relax and calm contents, such as guided meditation audios from different authors
* A community to share your thoughts, raise questions and read about hot topics related to mind concerns.
* A journal where you can track your daily thoughts and feelings.
* Lessons to learn about yourself based on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy
* Daily tasks about exercises, relax techniques to try and food recommendations to improve your mental and physical health

We hope we will really help you!

title: Anxiety Cures - Relieve Stress, Increase Happiness
description:
Anxiety Cures is an educational/research app to help you end anxiety, improve mental health, manage stress, reduce depression, increase mindfulness, stop panic attacks, and finding happiness. 

The app is updated regularly with in-depth knowledge, extensive research, and tools from many sources, that are scientifically shown to help reduce stress and improve relaxation, like calming sounds generator, brain training, sleep time calculator, and breathing exercises.

How To Use This App For Maximum Results
1️⃣  You will receive one (or more) articles virtually every day.
2️⃣  Spend 1-5 minutes to read/skim the article. If the article interest you, bookmark it for easier find later.
3️⃣  When you have more time in the day, you can dig deeper to understand more the subject taught in the article. Use your daily journal to make some notes as necessary. You can spend 15-30 minutes on this.
4️⃣  If the article requires you to take actions, e.g., to do some breathing exercise, relaxation or meditation, make a plan to find the best time and space where you can perform the actions effectively. You can do it on the same day, or later in the weekend.
5️⃣  Make this as part of your daily/weekly ritual, and you'll see positive changes happening in your life and happiness becomes your life's reality.

In today’s fast-paced, rapidly-changing world, feeling stressed and overwhelmed has quickly become a big part of our everyday lives – and being able to identify and cope with anxiety, stress, and depression is fast becoming an essential life skill.

Features
★ Contents to help relieve anxiety, sleep well, relaxation, happiness (updated regularly)
★ Motivational videos
★ Inspirational quotes
★ Tools for relaxation, breathing exercise, sleep sounds: rain sound, calming sound, white noise, sleep calculator, brain test, etc.
★ Free and fun games to help improve your mood, train your mental agility and kill some time.

Download now. Turn your stress to your advantage and your fear into confidence

title: Anxiety & Depression Symptoms
description:
Always free AUDIOBOOKS from Twayesh Projects - download today!

What is Anxiety and Depression?
✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹
Most people experience ups and downs in their life, and can feel unhappy, depressed, stressed or anxious during difficult times. This is a normal part of life.

Many difficult events and experiences can leave us in low spirits or cause depression: relationship problems, bereavement, sleep problems, stress at work, bullying, illness, and pain being just a few.

Changes to hormones, such as during puberty, after childbirth and during the menopause, can also have an effect on your emotional and mental health.

But sometimes it's possible to feel down without there being an obvious reason. 

When you have anxiety or depression, exercise often seems like the last thing you want to do. But once you get motivated, exercise can make a big difference. In this audio book you will learn all you need to know about how to handle these situations!

In this audiobook you read about these topics:
✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹✹
1 - What Is Anxiety?

2 - What Is Depression?

3 - Anxiety and Depression

5 - Diagnosing Depression

7 - Causes of Depression

title: Relaxing Music for Stress - Anxiety Relief & Sleep
description:
Relaxing Music for Stress - Anxiety Relief & Sleep Scientific studies have proven the positive effects of listening to relaxing sounds and calming sounds for anyone regardless of their types of personality and their moods. Such meditation music and soothing sounds have a huge impact on your brain and it helps you feel calm, relaxed and a whole lot better.

Relaxing Music for Stress - Anxiety Relief & Sleep, the free sleep music and relaxing sounds application, gets the most out of the importance of listening to these relaxing nature sounds and delivers the best sleep music experience ever. 

Collection of calming sounds for different moods and occasions

No matter you’ve had a rough day at work and looking for a way to ease your mind and get relaxed, you are having difficulty going to sleep and looking for some decent sleep music, or you are dealing with concentration issues and trying to improve your concentration by listening to meditation music, Repose has got you covered.

The collection of always updating peaceful sounds and natures sounds designed to optimize your cognitive processes and improve your brain functioning. That’s why listening to this relaxing sounds and meditation music is going to help you in any mood and occasion.

An amazing sleep app to listen to sleep music and sleep noise

There is nothing more important than a great night’s sleep that has effects on your both physical health and emotional well-being. Repose, the free sleep app, provides you with a huge collection of sleep music and sleep noise that will help you go to sleep easier than ever. 

You can also find so many baby sleep relaxing sounds and white noises that will help your babies have a way better sleeping experience. 

Say hello to calming nature sounds

Should we go through the soothing benefits of listening to nature sounds? Listening to the rain sounds, wind sounds inside a large forest, or fire crackles will improve your productivity and delivers a realistic and natural relaxation experience to ease your mind.

Here are some of the nature sounds you can find in this free relaxing sounds app: Wind in trees, fire crackles, distant train, heartbeat, sunny day, wind surge, forest, rustling leaves, thunder, storm, afternoon, Jupiter, and much more.

A mixer of relaxing sounds and noises

Relaxing Music for Stress, the free calming sound and noises app, enables you to easily create your own mix of relaxing sounds without any limitations. You can easily create unique mixes using different noises and sounds from different collections, and you can listen to the final mix wherever you are and whenever you want.

Relaxing Music main features at a glance

✓	Clean and neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
✓	Collection of HIGH-QUALITY peaceful sounds and noises
✓	Mixer of relaxing sounds
✓	Baby sleep noises and sounds
✓	White noise, pink noise, brown noise
✓	Animal sounds (Birds, frogs, owls, whales & much more)
✓	Nature sounds and noises
✓	Noises and sound to sleep
✓	Meditation music
✓	Useful for any mood and occasion

Relaxing Music for Stress, the free collection of natural relaxation sounds, is all about delivering the unique experience of mixing and listening to your favorite relaxing sounds and noises. The entire collection of soothing sounds and meditation music are available in high-quality and the ambiance has been professionally designed to make you feel like you are really in that environment and you are listening to the sounds of birds while it’s raining.  

Relaxing Music for Stress, the free sleep music app, on your Android phone or tablet, enjoy listening to peaceful and relaxing sounds, create your own mix of sounds and noises, relieve the stress and help your body function without any tension. And if you have a kid, don’t forget to check out the collection of baby sleep sounds and noises which will help your babies sleep deeper, easier and faster.

title: PinkyMind - Online counselling & therapy chat app
description:
Pinkymind is a leading online counselling platform with qualified and certified Psychologist, therapist and Listeners offering counselling and therapy for Stress, Anxiety, Panic attack, Depression, OCD, Relationship issues.

Launched on April 2nd, 2019, platform has handled over 15,000 chat sessions, 2000 therapy sessions.  

IMPORTANT FEATURES:
-	Remote counsellors offering online counselling and therapy over chat, call and video.
-	We offer Online counselling in Hindi, English and other regional languages
-	All counsellors are qualified, certified and experience
-	You can directly schedule the session with therapist or if you need assistance you can take Quick chat for assistance.
-	Each session is for 45 minutes
-	We offer AFFORDABLEAND ANONYMOUS online counseling

QUALIFIED AND CERTIFIED THERAPISTS
The mental illness may look small, but it can be horrific if the situation is not attended early. Please speak up instead of fighting the battle alone. Pinkymind Counselors or Psychologists or therapists are qualified and certified, who are here to help you to fight back against mental illnesses and burnouts. All online counselling sessions are confidential and if you still wish to keep the conversation anonymous you can do it by taking chat or audio appointment.

WHAT IS PINKYMIND? Why do we need it?
Pinkymind is a easy-to-use platform  for emotional online counselling or Psychology app, Online counselling is a medium for people to reach out, who for one reason or another, are hesitant to discuss their problems. The platform aims to address these problems before they fester and escalate. On Pinkymind you can discuss your problems without revealing your identity. The process is quite simple and secure.

WHO NEEDS OUR SERVICE?
a. People who require support to deal with 
-	Depression

-	Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
-	Panic attack

-	Mood disorders

-	LGBTQ

b. People who feel lonely and are hesitant to reach out due to social stigma.
